}Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(FrameIndexProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ChangingFrameIndex(DependencyObject obj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs ev)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GifImage gifImage = obj as GifImage;Di2015NewLine            gifImage.ChangeFrameIndex((int)ev.NewValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ChangeFrameIndex(int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Source = _decoder.Frames[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region GifSourceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty GifSourceProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("GifSource", typeof(string), typeof(GifImage), new UIPropertyMetadata(String.Empty, new PropertyChangedCallback(GifSourceChanged)));Di2015NewLine        public string GifSourceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (string)GetValue(GifSourceProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(GifSourceProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void GifSourceChanged(DependencyObject obj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs ev)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GifImage gifImage = obj as GifImage;Di2015NewLine            gifImage.GifSourceChanged(ev.NewValue.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void GifSourceChanged(string newSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_animation != null)Di2015NewLine                BeginAnimation(FrameIndexProperty, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _decoder = new GifBitmapDecoder(new Uri(newSource), BitmapCreateOptions.PreservePixelFormat, BitmapCacheOption.Default);Di2015NewLine            Source = _decoder.Frames[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int count = _decoder.Frames.Count;Di2015NewLine            _animation = new Int32Animation(0, count - 1, new Duration(new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0, count / 10, (int)((count / 10.0 - count / 10) * 1000))));Di2015NewLine            _animation.RepeatBehavior = RepeatBehavior.Forever;Di2015NewLine            BeginAnimation(FrameIndexProperty, _animation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5573075Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void UsingCompiledExpressionWithMethodCall() {Di2015NewLine        var where = typeof(Enumerable).GetMember("Where").First() as System.Reflection.MethodInfo;Di2015NewLine        where = where.MakeGenericMethod(typeof(int));Di2015NewLine        var l = Expression.Parameter(typeof(IEnumerable<int>), "l");Di2015NewLine        var arg0 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "i");Di2015NewLine        var lambda0 = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.Equal(Expression.Modulo(arg0, Expression.Constant(2)),Di2015NewLine                             Expression.Constant(0)), arg0).Compile();Di2015NewLine        var c1 = Expression.Call(where, l, Expression.Constant(lambda0));Di2015NewLine        var arg1 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "i");Di2015NewLine        var lambda1 = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, bool>>(Expression.GreaterThan(arg1, Expression.Constant(5)), arg1).Compile();Di2015NewLine        var c2 = Expression.Call(where, c1, Expression.Constant(lambda1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var f = Expression.Lambda<Func<IEnumerable<int>, IEnumerable<int>>>(c2, l);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var c3 = f.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t0 = DateTime.Now.Ticks;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 1; j < MAX; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sss = c3(x).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tn = DateTime.Now.Ticks;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Using lambda compiled with MethodCall: {0}", tn - t0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5576155Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(Collision) = i * 1/100000   where i is the number of values in the list.Di2015NewLine
5576155Di2015UniqueSeparatorP(n Collisions) = P(Collision) ^ n    Di2015NewLine   where n is the number of times a collision happensDi2015NewLine
5576155Di2015UniqueSeparatorNumerically...Di2015NewLine   when the list is half full, i = 150 andDi2015NewLine                 P(Collision) = 0.15% = 0.0015  andDi2015NewLine                 P(2 Collisions) = 0.00000225Di2015NewLine                 P(3 Collisions) - 0.000000003375Di2015NewLine                 P(4 Collisions) = 0.0000000000050265Di2015NewLine   when the list is all full but for the last one, i = 299 andDi2015NewLine                 P(Collision) = 0.299% = 0.00299   andDi2015NewLine                 P(2 Collisions) = 0.0000089401   (approx)Di2015NewLine                 P(3 Collisions) = 0.00000002673  (approx)Di2015NewLine                 P(4 Collisions) = 0.000000000079925  (approx)Di2015NewLine

5577393Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Management
5577393Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Management;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CPULoadDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // What to try to get :-)Di2015NewLine        static int TargetCpuUtilization = 50;Di2015NewLine        // An average window too large results in bad harmonics -- keep it small.Di2015NewLine        static int AverageWindow = 5;Di2015NewLine        // A somewhat large number gets better results here.Di2015NewLine        static int ThreadsPerCore = 8;Di2015NewLine        // WMI is *very slow* compared to a PerformanceCounter.Di2015NewLine        // It still works, but each cycle is *much* longer and it doesn'tDi2015NewLine        // exhibit as good of characteristics in maintaining a stable load.Di2015NewLine        // (It also seems to run a few % higher).Di2015NewLine        static bool UseWMI = false;Di2015NewLine        // Not sure if this helps -- but just play about :-)Di2015NewLine        static bool UseQuestionableAverage = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static int CoreCount () {Di2015NewLine            var sys = new ManagementObject("Win32_ComputerSystem.Name=\\"" + Environment.MachineName + "\\"");Di2015NewLine            return int.Parse("" + sys["NumberOfLogicalProcessors"]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Func<int> GetWmiSampler () {Di2015NewLine            var searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(Di2015NewLine                @"root\\CIMV2",Di2015NewLine                "SELECT PercentProcessorTime FROM Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor");Di2015NewLine            return () => {Di2015NewLine                var allCores = searcher.Get().OfType<ManagementObject>().First();Di2015NewLine                return int.Parse("" + allCores["PercentProcessorTime"]);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Func<int> GetCounterSampler () {Di2015NewLine            var cpuCounter = new PerformanceCounter {Di2015NewLine                CategoryName = "Processor",Di2015NewLine                CounterName = "% Processor Time",Di2015NewLine                InstanceName = "_Total",Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            return () => {Di2015NewLine                return (int)cpuCounter.NextValue();Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Func<LinkedList<int>, int> StandardAverage () {Di2015NewLine            return (samples) => {Di2015NewLine                return (int)samples.Average();Di2015NewLine            };    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Bias towards newest samplesDi2015NewLine        static Func<LinkedList<int>, int> QuestionableAverage () {Di2015NewLine            return (samples) => {Di2015NewLine                var weight = 4.0;Di2015NewLine                var sum = 0.0;Di2015NewLine                var max = 0.0;Di2015NewLine                foreach (var sample in samples) {Di2015NewLine                    sum += sample * weight;Di2015NewLine                    max += weight;Di2015NewLine                    weight = Math.Min(4, Math.Max(1, weight * 0.8));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return (int)(sum / max);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main (string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            var threadCount = CoreCount() * ThreadsPerCore;Di2015NewLine            var threads = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < threadCount; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Starting thread #" + i);                Di2015NewLine                var thread = new Thread(() => {Di2015NewLine                    Loader(Di2015NewLine                        UseWMI ? GetWmiSampler() : GetCounterSampler(),Di2015NewLine                        UseQuestionableAverage ? QuestionableAverage() : StandardAverage());Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine                thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine                thread.Priority = ThreadPriority.Highest;Di2015NewLine                thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                threads.Add(thread);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Fin!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Loader (Func<int> nextSample, Func<LinkedList<int>, int> average) {Di2015NewLine            Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine            long cycleCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            int cycleLength = 10;Di2015NewLine            int sleepDuration = 15;Di2015NewLine            int temp = 0;Di2015NewLine            var samples = new LinkedList<int>(new[] { 50 });Di2015NewLine            long totalSample = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true) {Di2015NewLine                cycleCount++;Di2015NewLine                var busyLoops = cycleLength * 1000;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < busyLoops; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    // Do some workDi2015NewLine                    temp = (int)(temp * Math.PI);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Take a breakDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(sleepDuration);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Add new sampleDi2015NewLine                    // This seems to work best when *after* the sleep/yieldDi2015NewLine                    var sample = nextSample();Di2015NewLine                    if (samples.Count >= AverageWindow) {Di2015NewLine                        samples.RemoveLast();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    samples.AddFirst(sample);Di2015NewLine                    totalSample += sample;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var avg = average(samples);Di2015NewLine                // should converge to 0Di2015NewLine                var conv = Math.Abs(TargetCpuUtilization - (int)(totalSample / cycleCount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format("avg:{0:d2} conv:{1:d2} sleep:{2:d2} cycle-length:{3}",Di2015NewLine                    avg, conv, sleepDuration, cycleLength));Di2015NewLine                // Manipulating both the sleep duration and work duration seemsDi2015NewLine                // to have the best effect. We don't change both at the sameDi2015NewLine                // time as that skews one with the other.Di2015NewLine                // Favor the cycle-length adjustment.Di2015NewLine                if (r.NextDouble() < 0.05) {Di2015NewLine                    sleepDuration += (avg < TargetCpuUtilization) ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine                    // Don't let sleep duration get unbounded upwards or itDi2015NewLine                    // can cause badly-oscillating behavior.Di2015NewLine                    sleepDuration = (int)Math.Min(24, Math.Max(0, sleepDuration));Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    cycleLength += (avg < TargetCpuUtilization) ? 1 : -1;Di2015NewLine                    cycleLength = (int)Math.Max(5, cycleLength);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5578101Di2015UniqueSeparator// In domain layer:Di2015NewLineMyEntity entity = new MyEntity();Di2015NewLineentity.PrimaryKey = 10;Di2015NewLineentity.Name = "Toby Larone";Di2015NewLineentity.Age = 27;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemyDataRepository.Update(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// In data layer:Di2015NewLinevoid Update(MyEntity changedEntity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var db = new DataContext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var entity = (from e in db.MyEntitiesDi2015NewLine                      where e.PrimaryKey == changedEntity.PrimaryKeyDi2015NewLine                      select e).First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Linq2Sql now has change tracking of "entity"... any changes made will be persisted when SubmitChanges is called...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        entity = changedEntity;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Linq2Sql does **not** have change tracking of changedEntity - the fact that it has been assigned to the same variable that once stored a tracked entity does not mean that Linq2Sql will magically pick up the changes...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        db.SubmitChanges(); // Nothing happens - as far as Linq2Sql is concerned, the entity that was selected in the first query has not been changed (only the variable in this scope has been changed to reference a different entity).Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5578101Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartial class MyEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void ApplyChanges(MyEntity changedEntity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.PrimaryKey = changeEntity.PrimaryKey;Di2015NewLine        this.Name = changedEntity.Name;Di2015NewLine        this.Age = changedEntity.Age;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5578101Di2015UniqueSeparator// In data layer:Di2015NewLinevoid Update(MyEntity changedEntity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var db = new DataContext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var entity = (from e in db.MyEntitiesDi2015NewLine                      where e.PrimaryKey == changedEntity.PrimaryKeyDi2015NewLine                      select e).First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Linq2Sql now has change tracking of "entity"... any changes made will be persisted when SubmitChanges is called...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        entity.ApplyChanges(changedEntity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        db.SubmitChanges(); // Works OK...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5580074Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal delegate void PathDelivery(JPTreeNode treeNode, Period periodInCommon); //Deliver a path through this delegateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class TreeHandler //The main classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly PathDelivery _pathDelivery;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Construct with Di2015NewLine    public TreeHandler(PathDelivery pathDelivery)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _pathDelivery = pathDelivery; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void HandleNode(IList<SourceRow> jpSource, int level,JPTreeNode parentNode, Period intersectingPeriod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sequenceId = level + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IList<SourceRow> children = new List<SourceRow>(System.Linq.Enumerable.Where(jpSource, S => S.Id == sequenceId));Di2015NewLine        if (children.Count == 0) //The last leaf level... return the path throug PathDelivery delegate if valid datesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (intersectingPeriod!= null)Di2015NewLine                _pathDelivery(parentNode, intersectingPeriod); //Only deliver this path if all nodes in path has an intersecting periodDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else //This node has children to addDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (SourceRow child in children) //Loop and create children Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Stop stop = new Stop(child.Id, child.Period, child.Description); //Value object for child nodeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Re-calculate the valid period (intersect) for the tree path Di2015NewLine                Period newIntersect = Period.Intersect(stop.Period, intersectingPeriod); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                JPTreeNode childNode = new JPTreeNode(parentNode, stop); //Create the child node Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (parentNode!= null) //If not at root level, add child node to parent nodeDi2015NewLine                    parentNode.ChildNodes.Add(childNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Recursive call, handle possible grandchildren (children of this childNode) or finish pathDi2015NewLine                HandleNode(jpSource, sequenceId, childNode, newIntersect); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Passed as delegate to TreeHandlerDi2015NewLine    private void CreatePathFromButtonNode(JPTreeNode treeNode, Period periodInCommon)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IList<Stop> stopList = new List<Stop>();Di2015NewLine        JPTreeNode currentNode = treeNode; Di2015NewLine        while (currentNode!= null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stopList.Add(currentNode.NodeValue);Di2015NewLine            currentNode = currentNode.ParentNode; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         _pathList.Add(new Path(periodInCommon, stopList));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5580804Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string DoSearch(string query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var results = (string)HttpContext.Current.Cache[query];Di2015NewLine    if (results == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object miniLock = _miniLocks.GetOrAdd(query, k => new object());Di2015NewLine        lock (miniLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            results = (string)HttpContext.Current.Cache[query];Di2015NewLine            if (results == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results = GetResultsFromSlowDb(query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Cache.Insert(query, results, null,Di2015NewLine                    DateTime.Now.AddHours(1), Cache.NoSlidingExpiration);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object temp;Di2015NewLine            if (_miniLocks.TryGetValue(query, out temp) && (temp == miniLock))Di2015NewLine                _miniLocks.TryRemove(query);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly ConcurrentDictionary<string, object> _miniLocks =Di2015NewLine                                  new ConcurrentDictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine

5582605Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Intersection(ref BoundingBox box)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double lr = Left - box.Right;Di2015NewLine        double rl = box.Left - Right;Di2015NewLine        double bt = Bottom - box.Top;Di2015NewLine        double tb = box.Bottom - Top;Di2015NewLine        double fb = Front - box.Back;Di2015NewLine        double bf = box.Front - Back;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lr > 0 || rl > 0 || bt > 0 || tb > 0 || bf > 0 || fb > 0)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double max = Math.Max(lr, Math.Max(rl, Math.Max(bt, Math.Max(tb, Math.Max(bf, fb)))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_complex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ComplexIntersection(ref box))Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (max == lr)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.X += max;Di2015NewLine        else if (max == rl)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.X -= max;Di2015NewLine        else if (max == bt)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.Y += max;Di2015NewLine        else if (max == tb)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.Y -= max;Di2015NewLine        else if (max == fb)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.Z += max;Di2015NewLine        else if (max == bf)Di2015NewLine            box.Center.Z -= max;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5584067Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string AppendQuerystring( string keyvalue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return AppendQuerystring(System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Request.RawUrl, keyvalue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static string AppendQuerystring(string url, string keyvalue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string dummyHost = "http://www.test.com:80/";Di2015NewLine        if (!url.ToLower().StartsWith("http"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            url = String.Concat(dummyHost, url);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        UriBuilder builder = new UriBuilder(url);Di2015NewLine        string query = builder.Query;Di2015NewLine        var qs = HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(query);Di2015NewLine        string[] pts = keyvalue.Split('&');Di2015NewLine        foreach (string p in pts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] pts2 = p.Split('=');Di2015NewLine            qs.Set(pts2[0], pts2[1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string key in qs.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(String.Format("{0}={1}&", key, qs[key]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        builder.Query = sb.ToString().TrimEnd('&');Di2015NewLine        string ret = builder.ToString().Replace(dummyHost,String.Empty);Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5588472Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void dependency_OnChange(Di2015NewLine   System::Object^ sender, SqlNotificationEventArgs^ e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This event will occur on a thread pool thread.Di2015NewLine    // Updating the UI from a worker thread is not permitted.Di2015NewLine    // The following code checks to see if it is safe toDi2015NewLine    // update the UI.Di2015NewLine    ISynchronizeInvoke^ i = this;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If InvokeRequired returns True, the codeDi2015NewLine    // is executing on a worker thread.Di2015NewLine    if (i->InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a delegate to perform the thread switch.Di2015NewLine        OnChangeEventHandler^ tempDelegate =Di2015NewLine            gcnew OnChangeEventHandler(this, &Form1::dependency_OnChange);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cli::array<System::Object^>^ args = gcnew cli::array<System::Object^>(2);Di2015NewLine        args[0] = sender;Di2015NewLine        args[1] = e;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Marshal the data from the worker threadDi2015NewLine        // to the UI thread.Di2015NewLine        i->BeginInvoke(tempDelegate, args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the handler, since it is only goodDi2015NewLine    // for a single notification.Di2015NewLine    SqlDependency^ dependency = safe_cast<SqlDependency^>(sender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dependency->OnChange -= gcnew OnChangeEventHandler(this, &Form1::dependency_OnChange);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // At this point, the code is executing on theDi2015NewLine    // UI thread, so it is safe to update the UI.Di2015NewLine    ++changeCount;Di2015NewLine    label1->Text = changeCount.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5589238Di2015UniqueSeparator//many normal classes can be made xml serializable by adding [Serializable] at the top of the classDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineprivate class ClassThingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Foos { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//here we create the objects so you can access them later individuallyDi2015NewLineClassThing thing1 = new ClassThing { Name = "name1", Foos = 1 };Di2015NewLineClassThing thing2 = new ClassThing { Name = "name2", Foos = 2 };Di2015NewLineClassThing thing3 = new ClassThing { Name = "name3", Foos = 3 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this is an example of putting them in a list so you can iterate through them later.Di2015NewLineList<ClassThing> listOfThings = new List<ClassThing>();Di2015NewLinelistOfThings.Add(thing1);Di2015NewLinelistOfThings.Add(thing2);Di2015NewLinelistOfThings.Add(thing3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//iteration exampleDi2015NewLinestring combined = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineforeach (ClassThing thing in listOfThings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    combined += thing.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//you could also have created them directly in the list, if you didnt need to have a reference for them individually, like this:Di2015NewLinelistOfThings.Add(new ClassThing { Name = "name4", Foos = 4 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//and more advanced concepts like linq can also help you aggregate your list to make the combined string. the foreach makes the code more readable though. this gives the same result as the foreach above, ignore it if it confuses you :)Di2015NewLinestring combined = listOfThings.Aggregate(string.Empty, (current, thing) => current + thing.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Here is an example of how you could serialize the list of ClassThing objects into a file:Di2015NewLineusing (FileStream fileStream = new FileStream("classthings.xml", FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(List<ClassThing>));Di2015NewLine    xmlSerializer.Serialize(fileStream, listOfThings);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5589371Di2015UniqueSeparatorClass ScalarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private byte dataByte = 0;Di2015NewLine    private short dataShort = 0;Di2015NewLine    // ... int, long, float, doubleDi2015NewLine    private string dataString = 0;Di2015NewLine    private List<Variable> dataList = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //constructors for "later" type casting (see below)Di2015NewLine    public Scalar(byte data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dataByte = data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //* repeat this for short, int, long, float, double, string, List<>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //implicit conversions for getting data outDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator byte(Scalar scalar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return scalar.dataByte;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //* repeat this for short, int, long, float, double, string, List<>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //implicit conversions for getting data in (invokes a constructor)Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Scalar(byte data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Scalar(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //* repeat this for short, int, long, float, double, string, List<>Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5589580Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float ComputeBoundingSphere(Mesh mesh, out Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 center)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Lock the vertex bufferDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.GraphicsStream data = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data = mesh.LockVertexBuffer(LockFlags.ReadOnly);Di2015NewLine            // Now compute the bounding sphereDi2015NewLine            return Geometry.ComputeBoundingSphere(data, mesh.NumberVertices, Di2015NewLine                mesh.VertexFormat, out center);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Make sure to unlock the vertex bufferDi2015NewLine            if (data != null)Di2015NewLine                mesh.UnlockVertexBuffer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Mesh SetSphericalTexture(Mesh mesh)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 vertexRay;Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 meshCenter;Di2015NewLine        double phi;Di2015NewLine        float u;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 north = new Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3(0f, 0f, 1f);Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 equator = new Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3(0f, 1f, 0f);Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3 northEquatorCross = Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3.Cross(north, equator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ComputeBoundingSphere(mesh, out meshCenter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (VertexBuffer vb = mesh.VertexBuffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CustomVertex.PositionNormalTextured[] verts = (CustomVertex.PositionNormalTextured[])vb.Lock(0, typeof(CustomVertex.PositionNormalTextured), LockFlags.None, mesh.NumberVertices);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < verts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //For each vertex take a ray from the centre of the mesh to the vertex and normalize so the dot products work.Di2015NewLine                    vertexRay = Microsoft.DirectX.Vector3.Normalize(verts[i].Position - meshCenter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    phi = Math.Acos((double)vertexRay.Z);Di2015NewLine                    if (vertexRay.Z > -0.9)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        verts[i].Tv = 0.121f; //percentage of the image being the top sideDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        verts[i].Tv = (float)(phi / Math.PI);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (vertexRay.Z == 1.0f || vertexRay.Z == -1.0f)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        verts[i].Tu = 0.5f;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        u = (float)(Math.Acos(Math.Max(Math.Min((double)vertexRay.Y / Math.Sin(phi), 1.0), -1.0)) / (2.0 * Math.PI));Di2015NewLine                        //Since the cross product is just giving us (1,0,0) i.e. the xaxis Di2015NewLine                        //and the dot product was giving us a +ve or -ve angle, we can just compare the x value with 0Di2015NewLine                        verts[i].Tu = (vertexRay.X > 0f) ? u : 1 - u;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                vb.Unlock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return mesh;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5591712Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string CryptedRandomString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int rand = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] randomNumber = new byte[5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RNGCryptoServiceProvider Gen = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            Gen.GetBytes(randomNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            rand = Math.Abs(BitConverter.ToInt32(randomNumber, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ConvertIntToStr(rand);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string ConvertIntToStr(int input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string output = "";Di2015NewLine            while (input > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int current = input % 10;Di2015NewLine                input /= 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current == 0)Di2015NewLine                    current = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output = (char)((char)'A' + (current - 1)) + output;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return output;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string messageSpan;Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(message)) {Di2015NewLine            TagBuilder spanTag = new TagBuilder("span");Di2015NewLine 5595688Di2015UniqueSeparator    public FileStream(string path, FileMode mode, FileAccess access, FileShare share, int unused)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IsolatedStorageFileStream handler = null;Di2015NewLine        if(FileStream.HandleTracker.TryGetValue(path, out handler)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _internal = handler;Di2015NewLine            if(!_internal.CanRead) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FileStream.HandleTracker.Remove(path);Di2015NewLine                CreateOpenNewFile(path, mode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            CreateOpenNewFile(path, mode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CreateOpenNewFile(string path, FileMode mode) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(mode == FileMode.Create || mode == FileMode.CreateNew) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _internal = IsolatedStorageIO.Default.CreateFile(path);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                _internal = IsolatedStorageIO.Default.OpenFile(path, FileMode.OpenOrCreate);Di2015NewLine            } catch(Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                var v = ex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        FileStream.HandleTracker.Add(path, _internal);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5595830Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource Last<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return list[count - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TSource current;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw Error.NoElements();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5596180Di2015UniqueSeparator    [XmlAttribute]Di2015NewLine    public string DataTableName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TaskListClass TaskList { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Execute(WorkContainer container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int iteration = 0;Di2015NewLine        string originalTaskName=String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Log StartDi2015NewLine        base.Execute(container);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the Data Table Based upon the ContainerKeyDi2015NewLine        DataTable loopTable = container.GetKeyValue<DataTable>(DataTableName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If not found throw exception and exitDi2015NewLine        if (loopTable == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                "DataTable Not Found or Initialized For Loop Variable",Di2015NewLine                DataTableName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // For each row returned run the task in order as a mini-processDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in loopTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            iteration++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (TaskBase task in TaskList.Tasks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If it is the first iteration then create a new string with the iteration numberDi2015NewLine                // else just replace the last iteration number with the current iteration numberDi2015NewLine                if (iteration == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task.Name = String.Format("Iteration {0} - {1}", iteration, task.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task.Name = task.Name.Replace(String.Format("Iteration {0}",iteration-1),String.Format("Iteration {0}",iteration));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Call the task Constructor to Initialize the objectDi2015NewLine                task.GetType().GetConstructor(new Type[0]).Invoke(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (DataColumn dc in loopTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Store in Stack VariableDi2015NewLine                    string propertyName = dc.ColumnName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // If a field in the table matches a Di2015NewLine                    // property Name set that propertyDi2015NewLine                    PropertyInfo propInfo = task.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine                    if (propInfo != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        propInfo.SetValue(task, row[dc], null);Di2015NewLine                    }                        Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Else if the task has a Parameters collection add the Di2015NewLine                        // name of the column and value to the Parameter CollectionDi2015NewLine                        propInfo = task.GetType().GetProperty("Parameters");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (propInfo != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            List<Parameter> parameters = propInfo.GetValue(task, null) as List<Parameter>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // If the parameter Name already Exist then Override itDi2015NewLine                            // This means that the values in the DataTable override the values in the XMLDi2015NewLine                            if (parameters.Contains(new Parameter { Name = propertyName }))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                parameters.Remove(new Parameter { Name = propertyName });Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            parameters.Add(new Parameter { Name = propertyName, Value = row[dc].ToString(), Type="String" });Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ParameterNotFoundException pExp = new ParameterNotFoundException(propertyName, task.GetType().ToString());Di2015NewLine                            throw new TaskException("Unable to assign a Parameter", pExp.Message, pExp);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                task.Execute(container);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Finish(container);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5601519Di2015UniqueSeparator    [DefaultProperty("Text")]Di2015NewLine    [ToolboxData("<{0}:DataAnnotationValidator runat=server></{0}:DataAnnotationValidator>")]Di2015NewLine    public class DataAnnotationValidator : BaseValidatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The type of the source to checkDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string SourceTypeName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The property that is annotatedDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string PropertyName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override bool EvaluateIsValid()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the type that we are going to validateDi2015NewLine            Type source = GetValidatedType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the property to validateDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo property = GetValidatedProperty(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the control validation valueDi2015NewLine            string value = GetControlValidationValue(ControlToValidate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var attribute in property.GetCustomAttributes(Di2015NewLine                     typeof(ValidationAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                       .OfType<ValidationAttribute>())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!attribute.IsValid(value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ErrorMessage = attribute.ErrorMessage;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Type GetValidatedType()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(SourceTypeName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                  "Null SourceTypeName can't be validated");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type validatedType = Type.GetType(SourceTypeName);Di2015NewLine            if (validatedType == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("{0}:{1}",Di2015NewLine                      "Invalid SourceTypeName", SourceTypeName));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IEnumerable<MetadataTypeAttribute> mt = validatedType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(MetadataTypeAttribute), false).OfType<MetadataTypeAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (mt.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                validatedType = mt.First().MetadataClassType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return validatedType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private FieldInfo GetValidatedProperty(Type source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo field = source.GetField(PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            if (field == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine 5601525Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class Base<T> { }Di2015NewLine    class Derived<T> : Base<T> { }Di2015NewLine    class Another<T> { }Di2015NewLine    class DerivedFromDerived<T> : Derived<T> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool DerivedFromBase<T>(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(Base<T>).IsAssignableFrom(type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(DerivedFromBase<int>(typeof(Derived<int>)));            // true    Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(DerivedFromBase<int>(typeof(Another<int>)));            // false    Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(DerivedFromBase<int>(typeof(DerivedFromDerived<int>))); // true   Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5601525Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool DerivedFromBase(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type openBase = typeof(Base<>);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var baseType = type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (baseType != typeof(Object) && baseType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (baseType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == openBase) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            baseType = baseType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5605449Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Derived1: BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Prop1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Derived2: BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Prop2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Window_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.DataContext = new List<Base>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Derived1(){Prop1 = "Hello"},Di2015NewLine        new Derived2() {Prop2 = "World"}Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5605490Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Create a stream for the fileDi2015NewLine    Stream stream = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This controls how many bytes to read at a time and send to the clientDi2015NewLine    int bytesToRead = 10000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Buffer to read bytes in chunk size specified aboveDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new Byte[bytesToRead];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The number of bytes readDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //Create a WebRequest to get the fileDi2015NewLine      HttpWebRequest fileReq = (HttpWebRequest) HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Create a response for this requestDi2015NewLine      HttpWebResponse fileResp = (HttpWebResponse) fileReq.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (fileReq.ContentLength > 0)Di2015NewLine        fileResp.ContentLength = fileReq.ContentLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the Stream returned from the responseDi2015NewLine        stream = fileResp.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // prepare the response to the client. resp is the client ResponseDi2015NewLine        var resp = HttpContext.Current.Response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Indicate the type of data being sentDi2015NewLine        resp.ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Name the file Di2015NewLine        resp.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=\\"" + fileName + "\\"");Di2015NewLine        resp.AddHeader("Content-Length", fileResp.ContentLength.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int length;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Verify that the client is connected.Di2015NewLine            if (resp.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Read data into the buffer.Di2015NewLine                length = stream.Read(buffer, 0, bytesToRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // and write it out to the response's output streamDi2015NewLine                resp.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Flush the dataDi2015NewLine                resp.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Clear the bufferDi2015NewLine                buffer = new Byte[bytesToRead];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // cancel the download if client has disconnectedDi2015NewLine                length = -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (length > 0); //Repeat until no data is readDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close the input streamDi2015NewLine            stream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

BoundsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new RectangleF(Location, new SizeF(2 * Radius, 2 * Radius));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Dot()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Radius = 5;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class DotDrawingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Dot> Dots { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int RowCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ColumnCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ColumnSpacing { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int RowSpacing { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int DotRadius { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DotDrawing()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dots = new      {Di2015NewLine                    Dot dot = new Dot();Di2015NewLine                    dot.Location = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine                    using (SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(ColorTranslator.FromHtml("#009aff")))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.FillEllipse(brush, dot.Location.X, dot.Location.Y, DotRadius, DotRadius);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    x += (DotRadius + ColumnSpacing);Di2015NewLine                    Dots.Add(dot);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            x = 0;Di2015NewLine            y += (DotRadius + this.RowSpacing);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 5612479Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string BinaryStringToHexString(string binary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder(binary.Length / 8 + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: check all 1's or 0's... Will throw otherwiseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int mod4Len = binary.Length % 8;Di2015NewLine    if (mod4Len != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // pad to length multiple of 8Di2015NewLine        binary = binary.PadLeft(((binary.Length / 8) + 1) * 8, '0');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < binary.Length; i += 8)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string eightBits = binary.Substring(i, 8);Di2015NewLine        result.AppendFormat("{0:X2}", Convert.ToByte(eightBits, 2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5614462Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class CustomErrorsFixerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static public void HandleErrors(HttpContext Context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          try{Di2015NewLine                ex=Context.Error.InnerException as HttpException;Di2015NewLine            }catch{Di2015NewLine                ex=null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ex != null){Di2015NewLine            Context.Response.StatusCode = ex.GetHttpCode();Di2015NewLine        }else{Di2015NewLine            Context.Response.StatusCode = 500;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Context.ClearError();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Context.Server.Transfer(GetCustomError(Context.Response.StatusCode.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.Response.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static protected string GetCustomError(string code)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CustomErrorsSection section = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("system.web/customErrors") as CustomErrorsSection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (section != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CustomError page = section.Errors[code];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (page != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return page.Redirect;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return section.DefaultRedirect;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static protected bool RunIt(HttpContext context){Di2015NewLine        CustomErrorsSection section = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("system.web/customErrors") as CustomErrorsSection;Di2015NewLine        switch(section.Mode){Di2015NewLine            case CustomErrorsMode.Off:Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            case CustomErrorsMode.On:Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            case CustomErrorsMode.RemoteOnly:Di2015NewLine                return !(context.Request.UserHostAddress=="127.0.0.1");Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5617471Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string ToEngineeringNotation(this double d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double exponent = Math.Log10(Math.Abs(d));Di2015NewLine        if (Math.Abs(d) >= 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch ((int)Math.Floor(exponent))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 0: case 1: case 2:Di2015NewLine                    return d.ToString();Di2015NewLine                case 3: case 4: case 5:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e3).ToString() + "k";Di2015NewLine                case 6: case 7: case 8:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e6).ToString() + "M";Di2015NewLine                case 9: case 10: case 11:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e9).ToString() + "G";Di2015NewLine                case 12: case 13: case 14:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e12).ToString() + "T";Di2015NewLine                case 15: case 16: case 17:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e15).ToString() + "P";Di2015NewLine                case 18: case 19: case 20:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e18).ToString() + "E";Di2015NewLine                case 21: case 22: case 23:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e21).ToString() + "Z";Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return (d / 1e24).ToString() + "Y";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Math.Abs(d) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch ((int)Math.Floor(exponent))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case -1: case -2: case -3:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e3).ToString() + "m";Di2015NewLine                case -4: case -5: case -6:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e6).ToString() + "";Di2015NewLine                case -7: case -8: case -9:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e9).ToString() + "n";Di2015NewLine                case -10: case -11: case -12:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e12).ToString() + "p";Di2015NewLine                case -13: case -14: case -15:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e15).ToString() + "f";Di2015NewLine                case -16: case -17: case -18:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e15).ToString() + "a";Di2015NewLine                case -19: case -20: case -21:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e15).ToString() + "z";Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return (d * 1e15).ToString() + "y";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "0";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5619823Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetTime(int Time)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Hrs = 0;    //number of hoursDi2015NewLine    int Min = 0;    //number of MinutesDi2015NewLine    int Sec = 0;    //number of SecDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //SecondsDi2015NewLine    Sec = Time % 60;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //MinutesDi2015NewLine    Min = ((Time - Sec) / 60) % 60;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //HoursDi2015NewLine    Hrs = ((Time - (Sec + (Min * 60))) / 3600) % 60;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Strings.Format(Hrs, "00") + ":" + Di2015NewLine           Strings.Format(Min, "00") + ":" +Di2015NewLine           Strings.Format(Sec, "00");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5620787Di2015UniqueSeparatorConditionalFormatter
5620787Di2015UniqueSeparatorConditionalFormat
5620787Di2015UniqueSeparatorPredicate
5620787Di2015UniqueSeparatorFormat
5620787Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ConditionalFormat<T> where T : IFormattable {Di2015NewLine  public Func<T, Boolean> Predicate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public String Format { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public static readonly Func<T, Boolean> Tautology = _ => true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ConditionalFormatter<T> : Collection<ConditionalFormat<T>>, IFormatProvider, ICustomFormatterDi2015NewLine  where T : IFormattable {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public const String FormatString = "Z";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly CultureInfo cultureInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ConditionalFormatter(IEnumerable<ConditionalFormat<T>> conditionalFormats)Di2015NewLine    : this(conditionalFormats, null) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ConditionalFormatter(IEnumerable<ConditionalFormat<T>> conditionalFormats, CultureInfo cultureInfo)Di2015NewLine    : base(conditionalFormats.ToList()) {Di2015NewLine    this.cultureInfo = cultureInfo;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Object GetFormat(Type formatType) {Di2015NewLine    return formatType == typeof(ICustomFormatter) ? this : null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public String Format(String format, Object arg, IFormatProvider formatProvider) {Di2015NewLine    if (arg.GetType() != typeof(T))Di2015NewLine      return HandleOtherFormats(format, arg);Di2015NewLine    var formatUpperCase = format.ToUpperInvariant();Di2015NewLine    if (formatUpperCase != FormatString)Di2015NewLine      return HandleOtherFormats(format, arg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var value = (T) arg;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var conditionalFormat in this)Di2015NewLine      if (conditionalFormat.Predicate(value))Di2015NewLine        return ((IFormattable) value).ToString(conditionalFormat.Format, cultureInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format("No format matching value {0}.", value));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  String HandleOtherFormats(String format, Object arg) {Di2015NewLine    var formattable = arg as IFormattable;Di2015NewLine    if (formattable != null)Di2015NewLine      return formattable.ToString(format, this.cultureInfo);Di2015NewLine    else if (arg != null)Di2015NewLine      return arg.ToString();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5624764Di2015UniqueSeparatorProcess process = Process.Start(startInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprocess.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool execTimeout = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this call back will be called when timer ticks, Timeout for process.Di2015NewLineTimerCallback callBack = (_process) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if the process didn't finish exexutingDi2015NewLine    // and the timeout has reached Di2015NewLine    // then kill the process.Di2015NewLine    if (!(_process as Process).HasExited)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        execTimeout = true;Di2015NewLine        (_process as Process).Kill();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint timeout = 4000; // 4 secondsDi2015NewLineSystem.Threading.Timer timer = new System.Threading.Timer(callBack, Di2015NewLine                                     process, timeout, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// block untill finishing executing [Sync calling]Di2015NewLineprocess.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Disable the timer. because the process has finished executing.Di2015NewLinetimer.Change(Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// if the process has finished by timeout [The timer which declared above]Di2015NewLine// or finished normally [success or failed].Di2015NewLineif (execTimeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Write in log hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string standardOutput = process.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    string standardError = process.StandardError.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5624860Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate UserControl LoadControl(string userControlPath, params object[] constructorParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var constParamTypes = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var constParam in constructorParameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            constParamTypes.Add(constParam.GetType());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ctl = Page.LoadControl(userControlPath) as UserControl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the relevant constructorDi2015NewLine        if (ctl != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var constructor = ctl.GetType().BaseType.GetConstructor(constParamTypes.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // And then call the relevant constructorDi2015NewLine            if (constructor == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new MemberAccessException("The requested constructor was not found on : " + ctl.GetType().BaseType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // constructor.Invoke(ctl, constructorParameters);Di2015NewLine            object[] cp = constructorParameters;Di2015NewLine            constructor.Invoke(ctl, cp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally return the fully initialized UCDi2015NewLine        return ctl;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine

   var incomingData = new StreamReader(request.InputStream).ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(incomingData))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // no     return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5626909Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool AreTablesEqual(DataTable t1, DataTable t2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If the number of rows is different, no need to compare the dataDi2015NewLine    if (t1.Rows.Count != t2.Rows.Count)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < t1.Rows.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(DataColumn col in t1.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!Equals(t1[i][col.Name], t2[i][col.Name]))Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5629851Di2015UniqueSeparator// Begin invoking the first and second method, and give them a callbackDi2015NewLineIAsyncResult result1 = Method.BeginInvoke(10, MyCallback, null)Di2015NewLineIAsyncResult result2 = Method.BeginInvoke(20, MyCallback, null)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Any time past the point of invokation, MyCallback could be called.Di2015NewLine// Get the wait handles of the async results, regardless of whether they have finished or notDi2015NewLineWaitHandle[] waitHandles = new WaitHandle[] { result1.AsyncWaitHandle, result2.AsyncWaitHandle};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Make sure to wait until the methods have finished.Di2015NewLine// They could have finished immediately, and MyCallback could have already been called,Di2015NewLine// but we will never get past this line unless they have finished.Di2015NewLineWaitHandle.WaitAll(waitHandles)Di2015NewLine// We may have waited on the function to finish, or they may have been done before we arrived at the previous line. Either way, they are done now.Di2015NewLine

= IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hTokenDup = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr pSessionInfo = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        int dwCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WTSEnumerateSessions(WTS_CURRENT_SERVER_HANDLE, 0, 1, ref pSessionInfo, ref dwCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int32 dataSize = currentToken);Di2015NewLine        if (bRet == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bRet = }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Runs this instance.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine processPath_ + "\\"";Di2015NewLine        if ((arguments_ != null) && (arguments_.Length != 0))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            command += " " + arguments_;Di2015NewLine current in processes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (current.ProcessName == processName_)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                current.Kill();Di2015NewLine 5643145Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Action<object, object> CreateSetter(FieldInfo field)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DynamicMethod dm = new DynamicMethod("DynamicSet", typeof(void),Di2015NewLine            new Type[] { typeof(object), typeof(object) }, field.DeclaringType, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ILGenerator generator = dm.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        if (field.FieldType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Unbox_Any, field.FieldType);Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field);Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Action<object, object>)dm.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<object, object>));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5646928Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder
5646975Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool OrganisationsNummer(string nr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Regex rg = new Regex(@"^(\\d{1})(\\d{5})\\-(\\d{4})$");Di2015NewLine    Match matches = rg.Match(nr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!matches.Success)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string group = matches.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine    string controlDigits = matches.Groups[3].Value;Di2015NewLine    string allDigits = group + matches.Groups[2].Value + controlDigits;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Int32.Parse(allDigits.Substring(2, 1)) < 2)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string nn = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int n = 0; n < allDigits.Length; n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nn += ((((n + 1) % 2) + 1) * Int32.Parse(allDigits.Substring(n, 1)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int checkSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int n = 0; n < nn.Length; n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        checkSum += Int32.Parse(nn.Substring(n, 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return checkSum % 10 == 0 ? true : false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

(Surrogate code points will need special care, and additional ranges within the BMP contain rare, historic, and uncommon characters.)Di2015NewLineconst double hannessThreshold = 0.25d;Di2015NewLineconst char lowestHanCodepoint = '\\u4E00';Di2015NewLineconst char highestHanCodepoint = '\\u9FFF';Di2015NewLinestring text = myTextBox.Text;Di2015NewLineint hanCharacterCount = 0;Di2015NewLineforeach (char c in text)Di2015NewLine    if (lowestHanCodepoint <= c && c <= highestHanCodepoint)Di2015NewLine        hanCharacterCount++;Di2015NewLinedouble hannessScore = (double)hanCharacterCount / text.Length;Di2015NewLineif (hannessScore >= hannessThreshold)Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("You are typing in Chinese, Japanese, or Korean!");Di2015NewLine

5654639Di2015UniqueSeparator        //Sample data from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/X_BitMapDi2015NewLine        int Width = 16;Di2015NewLine        int Height = 7;Di2015NewLine        byte[] test_bits = { 0x13, 0x0, 0x15, 0x0, 0x93, 0xcd, 0x55, 0xa5, 0x93, 0xc5, 0x0, 0x80, 0x0, 0x60 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create our bitmapDi2015NewLine        using (Bitmap B = new Bitmap(Width, Height))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Will hold our byte as a string of bitsDi2015NewLine            string Bits = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Current X,Y of the painting processDi2015NewLine            int X = 0;Di2015NewLine            int Y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Loop through all of the bitsDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < test_bits.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Convert the current byte to a string of bits and pad with extra 0's if neededDi2015NewLine                Bits = Convert.ToString(test_bits[i], 2).PadLeft(8, '0');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Bits are stored with the first pixel in the least signigicant bit so we need to work the string from right to leftDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 7; j >=0; j--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Set the pixel's color based on whether the current bit is a 0 or 1Di2015NewLine                    B.SetPixel(X, Y, Bits[j] == '0' ? Color.White : Color.Black);Di2015NewLine                    //Incremement our X positionDi2015NewLine                    X += 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //If we're passed the right boundry, reset the X and move the Y to the next lineDi2015NewLine                if (X >= Width)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    X = 0;Di2015NewLine                    Y += 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Output the bitmap to the desktopDi2015NewLine            B.Save(System.IO.Path.Combine(System.Environment.GetFolderPath(System.Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.bmp"), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5655061Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lists = new string[] { "123", "456", "789" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var seq in RotateGrid(lists))Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", seq));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> RotateGrid<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> grid) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int rows = grid.Count();Di2015NewLine    int cols = grid.First().Count();Di2015NewLine    return Di2015NewLine        from i in Enumerable.Range(0, rows + cols - 1)Di2015NewLine        select (Di2015NewLine            from j in Enumerable.Range(0, i + 1)Di2015NewLine            where i - j < rows && j < colsDi2015NewLine            select grid.ElementAt(i - j).ElementAt(j)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparator1Di2015NewLine4, 2Di2015NewLine7, 5, 3Di2015NewLine8, 6Di2015NewLine9Di2015NewLine
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList<T>
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparator.ElementAt
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable
5655061Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> RotateGrid<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> grid) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var enumerators = new LinkedList<IEnumerator<T>>();Di2015NewLine    var diagonal = Di2015NewLine        from e in enumeratorsDi2015NewLine        where e.MoveNext()Di2015NewLine        select e.Current;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var row in grid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enumerators.AddFirst(row.GetEnumerator());Di2015NewLine        yield return diagonal.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T[] output;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output = diagonal.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        if(output.Length == 0) yield break;Di2015NewLine        yield return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5655447Di2015UniqueSeparatorint
