5655539Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing
5655634Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoessInterpolatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static double DEFAULT_BANDWIDTH = 0.3;Di2015NewLine    public static int DEFAULT_ROBUSTNESS_ITERS = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * The bandwidth parameter: when computing the loess fit atDi2015NewLine     * a particular point, this fraction of source points closestDi2015NewLine     * to the current point is taken into account for computingDi2015NewLine     * a least-squares regression.Di2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     * A sensible value is usually 0.25 to 0.5.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private double bandwidth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * The number of robustness iterations parameter: this manyDi2015NewLine     * robustness iterations are done.Di2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     * A sensible value is usually 0 (just the initial fit without anyDi2015NewLine     * robustness iterations) to 4.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private int robustnessIters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LoessInterpolator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.bandwidth = DEFAULT_BANDWIDTH;Di2015NewLine        this.robustnessIters = DEFAULT_ROBUSTNESS_ITERS;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LoessInterpolator(double bandwidth, int robustnessIters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bandwidth < 0 || bandwidth > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("bandwidth must be in the interval [0,1], but got {0}", bandwidth));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.bandwidth = bandwidth;Di2015NewLine        if (robustnessIters < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("the number of robustness iterations must be non-negative, but got {0}", robustnessIters));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.robustnessIters = robustnessIters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Compute a loess fit on the data at the original abscissae.Di2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * @param xval the arguments for the interpolation pointsDi2015NewLine     * @param yval the values for the interpolation pointsDi2015NewLine     * @return values of the loess fit at corresponding original abscissaeDi2015NewLine     * @throws MathException if some of the following conditions are false:Di2015NewLine     * <ul>Di2015NewLine     * <li> Arguments and values are of the same size that is greater than zero</li>Di2015NewLine     * <li> The arguments are in a strictly increasing order</li>Di2015NewLine     * <li> All arguments and values are finite real numbers</li>Di2015NewLine     * </ul>Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public double[] smooth(double[] xval, double[] yval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (xval.Length != yval.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Loess expects the abscissa and ordinate arrays to be of the same size, but got {0} abscisssae and {1} ordinatae", xval.Length, yval.Length));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int n = xval.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Loess expects at least 1 point");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        checkAllFiniteReal(xval, true);Di2015NewLine        checkAllFiniteReal(yval, false);Di2015NewLine        checkStrictlyIncreasing(xval);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (n == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new double[] { yval[0] };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (n == 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new double[] { yval[0], yval[1] };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bandwidthInPoints = (int)(bandwidth * n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bandwidthInPoints < 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("the bandwidth must be large enough to accomodate at least 2 points. There are {0} " +Di2015NewLine                " data points, and bandwidth must be at least {1} but it is only {2}",Di2015NewLine                n, 2.0 / n, bandwidthDi2015NewLine            ));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double[] res = new double[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double[] residuals = new double[n];Di2015NewLine        double[] sortedResiduals = new double[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double[] robustnessWeights = new double[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do an initial fit and 'robustnessIters' robustness iterations.Di2015NewLine        // This is equivalent to doing 'robustnessIters+1' robustness iterationsDi2015NewLine        // starting with all robustness weights set to 1.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < robustnessWeights.Length; i++) robustnessWeights[i] = 1;Di2015NewLine        for (int iter = 0; iter <= robustnessIters; ++iter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] bandwidthInterval = { 0, bandwidthInPoints - 1 };Di2015NewLine            // At each x, compute a local weighted linear regressionDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double x = xval[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Find out the interval of source points on whichDi2015NewLine                // a regression is to be made.Di2015NewLine                if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    updateBandwidthInterval(xval, i, bandwidthInterval);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int ileft = bandwidthInterval[0];Di2015NewLine                int iright = bandwidthInterval[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Compute the point of the bandwidth interval that isDi2015NewLine                // farthest from xDi2015NewLine                int edge;Di2015NewLine                if (xval[i] - xval[ileft] > xval[iright] - xval[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    edge = ileft;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    edge = iright;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Compute a least-squares linear fit weighted byDi2015NewLine                // the product of robustness weights and the tricubeDi2015NewLine                // weight function.Di2015NewLine                // See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linear_regressionDi2015NewLine                // (section "Univariate linear case")Di2015NewLine                // and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weighted_least_squaresDi2015NewLine                // (section "Weighted least squares")Di2015NewLine                double sumWeights = 0;Di2015NewLine                double sumX = 0, sumXSquared = 0, sumY = 0, sumXY = 0;Di2015NewLine                double denom = Math.Abs(1.0 / (xval[edge] - x));Di2015NewLine                for (int k = ileft; k <= iright; ++k)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    double xk = xval[k];Di2015NewLine                    double yk = yval[k];Di2015NewLine                    double dist;Di2015NewLine                    if (k < i)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dist = (x - xk);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dist = (xk - x);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    double w = tricube(dist * denom) * robustnessWeights[k];Di2015NewLine                    double xkw = xk * w;Di2015NewLine                    sumWeights += w;Di2015NewLine                    sumX += xkw;Di2015NewLine                    sumXSquared += xk * xkw;Di2015NewLine                    sumY += yk * w;Di2015NewLine                    sumXY += yk * xkw;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double meanX = sumX / sumWeights;Di2015NewLine                double meanY = sumY / sumWeights;Di2015NewLine                double meanXY = sumXY / sumWeights;Di2015NewLine                double meanXSquared = sumXSquared / sumWeights;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double beta;Di2015NewLine                if (meanXSquared == meanX * meanX)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    beta = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    beta = (meanXY - meanX * meanY) / (meanXSquared - meanX * meanX);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double alpha = meanY - beta * meanX;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                res[i] = beta * x + alpha;Di2015NewLine                residuals[i] = Math.Abs(yval[i] - res[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // No need to recompute the robustness weights at the lastDi2015NewLine            // iteration, they won't be needed anymoreDi2015NewLine            if (iter == robustnessIters)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Recompute the robustness weights.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Find the median residual.Di2015NewLine            // An arraycopy and a sort are completely tractable here, Di2015NewLine            // because the preceding loop is a lot more expensiveDi2015NewLine            System.Array.Copy(residuals, sortedResiduals, n);Di2015NewLine            //System.arraycopy(residuals, 0, sortedResiduals, 0, n);Di2015NewLine            Array.Sort<double>(sortedResiduals);Di2015NewLine            double medianResidual = sortedResiduals[n / 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (medianResidual == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double arg = residuals[i] / (6 * medianResidual);Di2015NewLine                robustnessWeights[i] = (arg >= 1) ? 0 : Math.Pow(1 - arg * arg, 2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Given an index interval into xval that embraces a certain number ofDi2015NewLine     * points closest to xval[i-1], update the interval so that it embracesDi2015NewLine     * the same number of points closest to xval[i]Di2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * @param xval arguments arrayDi2015NewLine     * @param i the index around which the new interval should be computedDi2015NewLine     * @param bandwidthInterval a two-element array {left, right} such that: <p/>Di2015NewLine     * <tt>(left==0 or xval[i] - xval[left-1] > xval[right] - xval[i])</tt>Di2015NewLine     * <p/> and also <p/>Di2015NewLine     * <tt>(right==xval.length-1 or xval[right+1] - xval[i] > xval[i] - xval[left])</tt>.Di2015NewLine     * The array will be updated.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private static void updateBandwidthInterval(double[] xval, int i, int[] bandwidthInterval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int left = bandwidthInterval[0];Di2015NewLine        int right = bandwidthInterval[1];Di2015NewLine        // The right edge should be adjusted if the next point to the rightDi2015NewLine        // is closer to xval[i] than the leftmost point of the current intervalDi2015NewLine        if (right < xval.Length - 1 &&Di2015NewLine           xval[right + 1] - xval[i] < xval[i] - xval[left])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bandwidthInterval[0]++;Di2015NewLine            bandwidthInterval[1]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Compute the Di2015NewLine     * <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_regression#Weight_function">tricube</a>Di2015NewLine     * weight functionDi2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * @param x the argumentDi2015NewLine     * @return (1-|x|^3)^3Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private static double tricube(double x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double tmp = 1 - x * x * x;Di2015NewLine        return tmp * tmp * tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Check that all elements of an array are finite real numbers.Di2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * @param values the values arrayDi2015NewLine     * @param isAbscissae if true, elements are abscissae otherwise they are ordinataeDi2015NewLine     * @throws MathException if one of the values is notDi2015NewLine     *         a finite real numberDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private static void checkAllFiniteReal(double[] values, bool isAbscissae)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double x = values[i];Di2015NewLine            if (Double.IsInfinity(x) || Double.IsNaN(x))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string pattern = isAbscissae ?Di2015NewLine                        "all abscissae must be finite real numbers, but {0}-th is {1}" :Di2015NewLine                        "all ordinatae must be finite real numbers, but {0}-th is {1}";Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException(string.Format(pattern, i, x));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Check that elements of the abscissae array are in a strictlyDi2015NewLine     * increasing order.Di2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * @param xval the abscissae arrayDi2015NewLine     * @throws MathException if the abscissae arrayDi2015NewLine     * is not in a strictly increasing orderDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private static void checkStrictlyIncreasing(double[] xval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < xval.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i >= 1 && xval[i - 1] >= xval[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException(string.Format(Di2015NewLine                        "the abscissae array must be sorted in a strictly " +Di2015NewLine                        "increasing order, but the {0}-th element is {1} " +Di2015NewLine                        "whereas {2}-th is {3}",Di2015NewLine                        i - 1, xval[i - 1], i, xval[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5655676Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.Copy(Array, Int32, Array, Int32, Int32)
5655676Di2015UniqueSeparatorint xLength = upper.X - lower.X + 1;Di2015NewLineint yLength = upper.Y - lower.Y + 1;Di2015NewLineint zLength = upper.Z - lower.Z + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineArray copy = Array.CreateInstance(Elements.GetType(), new { xLength, yLength, zLength }, new {lower.X, lower.Y, lower.Z});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint skippedX = lower.X - Elements.GetLowerBound(0);Di2015NewLineint skippedY = lower.Y - Elements.GetLowerBound(1);Di2015NewLineint skippedZ = lower.Z - Elements.GetLowerBound(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint sourceDim0Size = Elements.GetLength(1) * Elements.GetLength(2);Di2015NewLineint sourceDim1Size = Elements.GetLength(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < xLength; x++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     for (int y = 0; y < yLength; y++)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         int destinationIndex = x * yLength * zLength + y * zLength;Di2015NewLine         int sourceIndex = (x + skippedX) * sourceDim0Size Di2015NewLine                           + (y + skippedY) * sourceDim1SizeDi2015NewLine                           + skippedZ;Di2015NewLine         Array.Copy(Elements, sourceIndex, copy, 0, zLength);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

5656686Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CellSetConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanReadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (objectType == typeof(CellSet))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CellSet cellSet = (CellSet)value;Di2015NewLine        int cellCount = cellSet.Cells.Count;Di2015NewLine        int[] axisCounts = new int[cellSet.Axes.Count];Di2015NewLine        int[] currentIndex = new int[cellSet.Axes.Count];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < axisCounts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            axisCounts[i] = cellSet.Axes[i].Positions.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < cellSet.Axes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteStartArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, cellSet[currentIndex].Value);Di2015NewLine            currentIndex = IncrementIndex(writer, currentIndex, axisCounts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] GetCaptions(CellSet cellSet, int[] index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] captions = new string[index.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < index.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Axis axis = cellSet.Axes[i];Di2015NewLine            captions[i] = axis.Positions[index[i]].Members[0].Caption;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return captions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] IncrementIndex(JsonWriter writer, int[] index, int[] maxSizes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool incremented = false;Di2015NewLine        int currentAxis = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (!incremented)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index[currentAxis] + 1 == maxSizes[currentAxis])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteEndArray();Di2015NewLine                index[currentAxis] = 0;Di2015NewLine                currentAxis++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < currentAxis; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteStartArray();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                index[currentAxis]++;Di2015NewLine                incremented = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentAxis == index.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5656686Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceContract]Di2015NewLinepublic class MdxServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string JsonMimeType = "application/json";Di2015NewLine    const string connectionString = "[Data Source String]";Di2015NewLine    const string mdx = "[MDX query]";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine    [WebGet(UriTemplate = "OlapResults?session={session}&sequence={sequence}")]Di2015NewLine    public Stream GetResults(string session, string sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CellSet cellSet;Di2015NewLine        using (AdomdConnection connection = new AdomdConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connection.Open();Di2015NewLine            AdomdCommand command = connection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = mdx;Di2015NewLine            cellSet = command.ExecuteCellSet();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string result = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(cellSet, new CellSetConverter());Di2015NewLine        WebOperationContext.Current.OutgoingResponse.ContentType = JsonMimeType;Di2015NewLine        Encoding encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = encoding.GetBytes(result);Di2015NewLine        return new MemoryStream(bytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

0 : selectedcolumnindex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (null != cell)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FocusManager.SetFocusedElement(grid, cell as IInputElement);Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void grid_LostKeyboardFocus(object sender, KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(e.NewFocus is DataGridCell))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (grid.CurrentCell != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                selectedcolumnindex = grid.Columns.IndexOf(grid.CurrentCell.Column);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void grid_PreviewKeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Keyboard.Modifiers == ModifierKeys.Shift && e.Key == Key.Tab)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastDataGridFocus = Keyboard.FocusedElement;Di2015NewLine            grid.MoveFocus(new TraversalRequest(FocusNavigationDirection.Previous));Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Keyboard.Modifiers == ModifierKeys.None && e.Key == Key.Tab)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastDataGridFocus = Keyboard.FocusedElement;Di2015NewLine            grid.MoveFocus(new TraversalRequest(FocusNavigationDirection.Last));Di2015NewLine            (Keyboard.FocusedElement as FrameworkElement).MoveFocus(new TraversalRequest(FocusNavigationDirection.Next));Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5659258Di2015UniqueSeparatorRead
5659258Di2015UniqueSeparatorRead
5659258Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] chunk = new byte[MaxChunkSize];Di2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    // There are various different ways of structuring this bit of code.Di2015NewLine    // Fundamentally we're trying to keep reading in to our chunk untilDi2015NewLine    // either we reach the end of the stream, or we've read everything we need.Di2015NewLine    while (index < chunk.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = stream.Read(chunk, index, chunk.Length - index);Di2015NewLine        if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        index += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (index != 0) // Our previous chunk may have been the last oneDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendChunk(chunk, index); // index is the number of bytes in the chunkDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (index != chunk.Length) // We didn't read a full chunk: we're doneDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5659258Di2015UniqueSeparator// Attempts to read an entire chunk into the given array; returns the size ofDi2015NewLine// chunk actually read.Di2015NewLineint ReadChunk(Stream stream, byte[] chunk)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (index < chunk.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = stream.Read(chunk, index, chunk.Length - index);Di2015NewLine        if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        index += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return index;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5661019Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Parsing_String(string filename)    Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dt = CreateDataTable();Di2015NewLine    foreach (String str in File.ReadLines(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      String[] strCols = str.Split(Convert.ToChar(" "));Di2015NewLine      DataRow Row = dt.NewRow(); //Where dt is a DataTableDi2015NewLine      for (int i =0; i < strCols.length; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine           Row[i] = strCols[i].Substring(2); //This will start reading from the third characterDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      dt.Rows.Add(Row);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine      listView1.ItemsSource = dt.Rows;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//**EDIT**: Just in case you don't have a datatable and you want to create a small one:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic DataTable CreateDataTable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        new string[] { "Column 1", "Column 2", "Column 3", "Column 4", "Column 5", "Column 6" }Di2015NewLine            .ToList()Di2015NewLine            .ForEach(c => { dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(c)); });Di2015NewLine        return dt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5661019Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Parsing_String(string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Row> list = new List<Row>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (String str in File.ReadLines(filename))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String[] strCols = str.Split(Convert.ToChar(" "));Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new Row() Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Column1 = strCols[0].Substring(2),Di2015NewLine                Column2 = strCols[1].Substring(2),Di2015NewLine                Column3 = strCols[2].Substring(2),Di2015NewLine                Column4 = strCols[3].Substring(2),Di2015NewLine                Column5 = strCols[4].Substring(2),Di2015NewLine                Column6 = strCols[5].Substring(2)Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dg.ItemsSource = list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class RowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Column1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Column2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Column3 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Column4 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Column5 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Column6 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5661804Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<object, string> expr = CompileDataBinder(typeof(Model), "PocoProperty.Name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var model = new Model { PocoProperty = new ModelPoco { Name = "Foo" } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string propertyName = expr(model);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Func<object, string> CompileDataBinder(Type type, string expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        Expression body = Expression.Convert(param, type);Di2015NewLine        var members = expr.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < members.Length;i++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            body = Expression.PropertyOrField(body, members[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var method = typeof(Convert).GetMethod("ToString", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public,Di2015NewLine            null, new Type[] { body.Type }, null);Di2015NewLine        if (method == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            method = typeof(Convert).GetMethod("ToString", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public,Di2015NewLine                null, new Type[] { typeof(object)}, null);Di2015NewLine            body = Expression.Call(method, Expression.Convert(body, typeof(object)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            body = Expression.Call(method, body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<object, string>>(body, param).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ModelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ModelPoco PocoProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ModelPocoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5665993Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Timers;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TestDi2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    // Change these values to control the behavior of the program.Di2015NewLine    private static int testRuns = 100;Di2015NewLine    // Times are given in milliseconds:Di2015NewLine    private static int testRunsFor = 500;Di2015NewLine    private static int timerIntervalBase = 100;Di2015NewLine    private static int timerIntervalDelta = 20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Timers.Di2015NewLine    private static System.Timers.Timer Timer1 = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine    private static System.Timers.Timer Timer2 = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine    private static System.Timers.Timer currentTimer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is the synchronization point that prevents eventsDi2015NewLine    // from running concurrently, and prevents the main thread Di2015NewLine    // from executing code after the Stop method until any Di2015NewLine    // event handlers are done executing.Di2015NewLine    private static int syncPoint = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Count the number of times the event handler is called,Di2015NewLine    // is executed, is skipped, or is called after Stop.Di2015NewLine    private static int numEvents = 0;Di2015NewLine    private static int numExecuted = 0;Di2015NewLine    private static int numSkipped = 0;Di2015NewLine    private static int numLate = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Count the number of times the thread that calls StopDi2015NewLine    // has to wait for an Elapsed event to finish.Di2015NewLine    private static int numWaits = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [MTAThread]Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Timer1.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(Timer1_ElapsedEventHandler);Di2015NewLine        Timer2.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(Timer2_ElapsedEventHandler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 1; i <= testRuns; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TestRun();Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("\\rTest {0}/{1}    ", i, testRuns);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} test runs completed.", testRuns);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} events were raised.", numEvents);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} events executed.", numExecuted);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} events were skipped for concurrency.", numSkipped);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} events were skipped because they were late.", numLate);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Control thread waited {0} times for an event to complete.", numWaits);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TestRun()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Set syncPoint to zero before starting the test Di2015NewLine        // run. Di2015NewLine        syncPoint = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Test runs alternate between Timer1 and Timer2, to avoidDi2015NewLine        // race conditions between tests, or with very late events.Di2015NewLine        if (currentTimer == Timer1)Di2015NewLine            currentTimer = Timer2;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            currentTimer = Timer1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentTimer.Interval = timerIntervalBase Di2015NewLine            - timerIntervalDelta + rand.Next(timerIntervalDelta * 2);Di2015NewLine        currentTimer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start the control thread that shuts off the timer.Di2015NewLine        Thread t = new Thread(ControlThreadProc);Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait until the control thread is done before proceeding.Di2015NewLine        // This keeps the test runs from overlapping.Di2015NewLine        t.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ControlThreadProc()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Allow the timer to run for a period of time, and then Di2015NewLine        // stop it.Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(testRunsFor);Di2015NewLine        currentTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The 'counted' flag ensures that if this thread hasDi2015NewLine        // to wait for an event to finish, the wait only gets Di2015NewLine        // counted once.Di2015NewLine        bool counted = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensure that if an event is currently executing,Di2015NewLine        // no further processing is done on this thread untilDi2015NewLine        // the event handler is finished. This is accomplishedDi2015NewLine        // by using CompareExchange to place -1 in syncPoint,Di2015NewLine        // but only if syncPoint is currently zero (specifiedDi2015NewLine        // by the third parameter of CompareExchange). Di2015NewLine        // CompareExchange returns the original value that wasDi2015NewLine        // in syncPoint. If it was not zero, then there's anDi2015NewLine        // event handler running, and it is necessary to tryDi2015NewLine        // again.Di2015NewLine        while (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref syncPoint, -1, 0) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Give up the rest of this thread's current timeDi2015NewLine            // slice. This is a naive algorithm for yielding.Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Tally a wait, but don't count multiple calls toDi2015NewLine            // Thread.Sleep.Di2015NewLine            if (!counted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                numWaits += 1;Di2015NewLine                counted = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Any processing done after this point does not conflictDi2015NewLine        // with timer events. This is the purpose of the call toDi2015NewLine        // CompareExchange. If the processing done here would notDi2015NewLine        // cause a problem when run concurrently with timer events,Di2015NewLine        // then there is no need for the extra synchronization.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Event-handling methods for the Elapsed events of the twoDi2015NewLine    // timers.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    private static void Timer1_ElapsedEventHandler(object sender, Di2015NewLine        ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HandleElapsed(sender, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Timer2_ElapsedEventHandler(object sender, Di2015NewLine        ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HandleElapsed(sender, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void HandleElapsed(object sender, ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        numEvents += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This example assumes that overlapping events can beDi2015NewLine        // discarded. That is, if an Elapsed event is raised before Di2015NewLine        // the previous event is finished processing, the secondDi2015NewLine        // event is ignored. Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // CompareExchange is used to take control of syncPoint, Di2015NewLine        // and to determine whether the attempt was successful. Di2015NewLine        // CompareExchange attempts to put 1 into syncPoint, butDi2015NewLine        // only if the current value of syncPoint is zero Di2015NewLine        // (specified by the third parameter). If another threadDi2015NewLine        // has set syncPoint to 1, or if the control thread hasDi2015NewLine        // set syncPoint to -1, the current event is skipped. Di2015NewLine        // (Normally it would not be necessary to use a local Di2015NewLine        // variable for the return value. A local variable is Di2015NewLine        // used here to determine the reason the event was Di2015NewLine        // skipped.)Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        int sync = Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref syncPoint, 1, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (sync == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No other event was executing.Di2015NewLine            // The event handler simulates an amount of workDi2015NewLine            // lasting between 50 and 200 milliseconds, so thatDi2015NewLine            // some events will overlap.Di2015NewLine            int delay = timerIntervalBase Di2015NewLine                - timerIntervalDelta / 2 + rand.Next(timerIntervalDelta);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(delay);Di2015NewLine            numExecuted += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Release control of syncPoint.Di2015NewLine            syncPoint = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sync == 1) { numSkipped += 1; } else { numLate += 1; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* On a dual-processor computer, this code example producesDi2015NewLine   results similar to the following:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTest 100/100    100 test runs completed.Di2015NewLine436 events were raised.Di2015NewLine352 events executed.Di2015NewLine84 events were skipped for concurrency.Di2015NewLine0 events were skipped because they were late.Di2015NewLineControl thread waited 77 times for an event to complete.Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine

5667093Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (_serializeDataToStream == null)Di2015NewLine    _serializeDataToStream = (Action<BinaryWriter, int, T[]>)GetTypeSpecificSerializationMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine_serializeDataToStream(writer, _size, _data);Di2015NewLine
5667093Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns a delegate that points at the static type specific serialization methodDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLineprivate Delegate GetTypeSpecificDeserializationMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(T) == typeof(double))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = this.GetType().GetMethod("DeserializeDouble", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<BinaryReader, int, T[]>), method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (typeof(T) == typeof(ushort))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = this.GetType().GetMethod("DeserializeUshort", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<BinaryReader, int, T[]>), method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (typeof(T) == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = this.GetType().GetMethod("DeserializeDateTime", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<BinaryReader, int, T[]>), method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (typeof(T) == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = this.GetType().GetMethod("DeserializeBool", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<BinaryReader, int, T[]>), method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new NotImplementedException("No deserialization method has been setup for type " + typeof(T).FullName);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Serialize double[] to BinaryWriterDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="writer"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="size"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="data"></param>Di2015NewLineprivate static void SerializeDouble(BinaryWriter writer, int size, double[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(data[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5668121Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Delegate BuildDynamicHandle(Type delegateType, Func<object[], object> func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invokeMethod = delegateType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine        var parms = invokeMethod.GetParameters().Select(parm => Expression.Parameter(parm.ParameterType, parm.Name)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var instance = func.Target == null ? null : Expression.Constant(func.Target);Di2015NewLine        var converted = parms.Select(parm => Expression.Convert(parm, typeof(object)));Di2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Call(instance, func.Method, Expression.NewArrayInit(typeof(object), converted));Di2015NewLine        var body =Di2015NewLine            invokeMethod.ReturnType == typeof(void) ? (Expression)call : Expression.Convert(call, invokeMethod.ReturnType);Di2015NewLine        var expr = Expression.Lambda(delegateType, body, parms);Di2015NewLine        return expr.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5670231Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string path = @"D:\\tmp\\so5670107.txt";Di2015NewLine    string[] lines = File.ReadAllLines(path);Di2015NewLine    string prefix = LongestCommonPrefix(lines);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(prefix);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string LongestCommonPrefix(string a, string b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int length = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < a.Length && i < b.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a[i] == b[i])Di2015NewLine            length++;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return a.Substring(0, length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string LongestCommonPrefix(IEnumerable<string> strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return strings.Aggregate(LongestCommonPrefix);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5670600Di2015UniqueSeparatorswitch (Order[State])Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    case PrimaryColor.Red:Di2015NewLine        ActualColor.r++;Di2015NewLine        if(ActualColor.g > 0) ActualColor.g--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.b > 0) ActualColor.b--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.r == 255 && ActualColor.g == 0 && ActualColor.b == 0) State++;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case PrimaryColor.Green:Di2015NewLine        ActualColor.g++;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.r > 0) ActualColor.r--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.b > 0) ActualColor.b--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.r == 0 && ActualColor.g == 255 && ActualColor.b == 0) State++;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case PrimaryColor.Blue:Di2015NewLine        ActualColor.b++;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.g > 0) ActualColor.g--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.r > 0) ActualColor.r--;Di2015NewLine        if (ActualColor.r == 0 && ActualColor.g == 0 && ActualColor.b == 255) State++;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    default:Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (State == Order.Length) State = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Send color data to your controllerDi2015NewLine

5671320Di2015UniqueSeparator//Your Code HereDi2015NewLine
5671320Di2015UniqueSeparator// write everything out to the baos.Di2015NewLinedoc.close(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// and suck it right back up again.  Hurray for efficiency.  Or something.Di2015NewLinePdfReader reader = new PdfReader(baos.toByteArrayOrWhateverItsCalled());Di2015NewLinePdfStamper stamper = new PdfStamper( reader, new FileOutputStream(outputPath));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// duplicate the pages.  I'll assume only one page, but you'll get the idea.Di2015NewLinePdfDictionary origPage = reader.getPageN(1);Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {Di2015NewLine  // initial size is irrelevant, we're going to change it, but !nullDi2015NewLine  stamper.insertPage(2+i, PageSize.LETTER); Di2015NewLine  PdfDictionary newPageDict = reader.getPage(2 + i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // copy the original page... note that this is a shallow copyDi2015NewLine  newPageDict.putAll(origPageDict);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // duplicate the page rect so each page will have its own copyDi2015NewLine  PdfArray pageRect = newPageDict.getAsArray(PdfName.MEDIABOX);Di2015NewLine  // also a shallow copy, but changes to this array will be localized to the page.Di2015NewLine  PdfArray newRect = new PdfArray(pageRect);Di2015NewLine  // page rects are defined as [llx lly urx ury], so we need to change 0 and 2.Di2015NewLine  newRect.set(0, new PdfNumber(origWidth * (i+1));Di2015NewLine  newRect.set(2, new PdfNumber(origWidth * (i+2));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Smoke'em if you've got 'em folks, we're done.Di2015NewLinestamper.close();Di2015NewLine

5676629Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Bcpg.OpenPgp;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Security;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Utilities.IO;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Utilities.Encoders;Di2015NewLineusing Org.BouncyCastle.Bcpg;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static PgpPublicKey ReadPublicKey(Stream inputStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        inputStream = PgpUtilities.GetDecoderStream(inputStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpPublicKeyRingBundle pgpPub = new PgpPublicKeyRingBundle(inputStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // we just loop through the collection till we find a key suitable for encryption, in the realDi2015NewLine        // world you would probably want to be a bit smarter about this.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // iterate through the key rings.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PgpPublicKeyRing kRing in pgpPub.GetKeyRings())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (PgpPublicKey k in kRing.GetPublicKeys())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (k.IsEncryptionKey)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return k;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Can't find encryption key in key ring.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte[] EncryptFile(byte[] clearData, string fileName, PgpPublicKey encKey, bool withIntegrityCheck)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream bOut = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpCompressedDataGenerator comData = new PgpCompressedDataGenerator(Di2015NewLine            CompressionAlgorithmTag.Zip);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream cos = comData.Open(bOut); // open it with the final destinationDi2015NewLine        PgpLiteralDataGenerator lData = new PgpLiteralDataGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we want to Generate compressed data. This might be a user option later,Di2015NewLine        // in which case we would pass in bOut.Di2015NewLine        Stream pOut = lData.Open(Di2015NewLine            cos,                    // the compressed output streamDi2015NewLine            PgpLiteralData.Binary,Di2015NewLine            fileName,               // "filename" to storeDi2015NewLine            clearData.Length,       // length of clear dataDi2015NewLine            DateTime.UtcNow         // current timeDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pOut.Write(clearData, 0, clearData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lData.Close();Di2015NewLine        comData.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PgpEncryptedDataGenerator cPk = new PgpEncryptedDataGenerator(SymmetricKeyAlgorithmTag.Cast5, new SecureRandom());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cPk.AddMethod(encKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = bOut.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream encOut = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        Stream os = encOut;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream cOut = cPk.Open(os, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        cOut.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);  // obtain the actual bytes from the compressed streamDi2015NewLine        cOut.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        encOut.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return encOut.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] dataBytes = File.ReadAllBytes("test.xml");Di2015NewLine            Stream keyIn = File.OpenRead("cert.asc");Di2015NewLine            Stream outStream = File.Create("data.bpg");Di2015NewLine            byte[] encrypted = EncryptFile(dataBytes, "data", ReadPublicKey(keyIn), false);Di2015NewLine            outStream.Write(encrypted, 0, encrypted.Length);Di2015NewLine            keyIn.Close();Di2015NewLine            outStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      public int cx;Di2015NewLine        public int cy;Di2015NewLine        public int flags;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate void ResizeChildDelegate(WINDOWPOS wpos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ResizeChild(WINDOWPOS wpos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // verify if it's the right instance of MyPanel if neededDi2015NewLine        if ((this.Controls.Count == 1) && (this.Controls[0] is Panel))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Panel child = this.Controls[0] as Panel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // stop window redraw to avoid flickerDi2015NewLine            SendMessage(new HandleRef(child, child.Handle), WM_SETREDRAW, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // start a new stack of SetWindowPos callsDi2015NewLine            SetWindowPos(new HandleRef(child, child.Handle), new HandleRef(null, IntPtr.Zero),Di2015NewLine            0, 0, wpos.cx, wpos.cy, SWP_NOACTIVATE | SWP_NOZORDER);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // turn window repainting back on Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(new HandleRef(child, child.Handle), WM_SETREDRAW, 1, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // send repaint message to this control and its childrenDi2015NewLine            this.Invalidate(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WINDOWPOS wpos = new WINDOWPOS();Di2015NewLine            Marshal.PtrToStructure(m.LParam, wpos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING received by " + this.Name + " flags " + wpos.flags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (((wpos.flags & (SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOACTIVATE)) == (SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOACTIVATE)) &&Di2015NewLine            ((wpos.flags & ~(SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOACTIVATE)) == 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((wpos.cx != this.Width) || (wpos.cy != this.Height))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BeginInvoke(new ResizeChildDelegate(ResizeChild), wpos);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5678575Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void LoadPipelinedImages(IEnumerable<string> fileNames, Di2015NewLine                                    string sourceDir, Di2015NewLine                                    BlockingCollection<ImageInfo> original,Di2015NewLine                                    CancellationTokenSource cts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ...Di2015NewLine        var token = cts.Token;Di2015NewLine        ImageInfo info = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var fileName in fileNames)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (token.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                info = LoadImage(fileName, ...);Di2015NewLine                original.Add(info, token);Di2015NewLine                info = null;Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // in case of exception, signal shutdown to other pipeline tasksDi2015NewLine            cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine            if (!(e is OperationCanceledException))Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            original.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine            if (info != null) info.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5678575Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void RunPipelined(IEnumerable<string> fileNames, Di2015NewLine                             string sourceDir, Di2015NewLine                             int queueLength, Di2015NewLine                             Action<ImageInfo> displayFn,Di2015NewLine                             CancellationTokenSource cts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Data pipes Di2015NewLine        var originalImages = new BlockingCollection<ImageInfo>(queueLength);Di2015NewLine        var thumbnailImages = new BlockingCollection<ImageInfo>(queueLength);Di2015NewLine        var filteredImages = new BlockingCollection<ImageInfo>(queueLength);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var f = new TaskFactory(TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning,Di2015NewLine                                    TaskContinuationOptions.None);Di2015NewLine            // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start pipelined tasksDi2015NewLine            var loadTask = f.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                  LoadPipelinedImages(fileNames, sourceDir, Di2015NewLine                                      originalImages, cts));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var scaleTask = f.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                  ScalePipelinedImages(originalImages, Di2015NewLine                                       thumbnailImages, cts));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var filterTask = f.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                  FilterPipelinedImages(thumbnailImages, Di2015NewLine                                        filteredImages, cts));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var displayTask = f.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                  DisplayPipelinedImages(filteredImages.GetConsumingEnumerable(), Di2015NewLine                       ... cts));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(loadTask, scaleTask, filterTask, displayTask);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // in case of exception or cancellation, there might be bitmapsDi2015NewLine            // that need to be disposed.Di2015NewLine            DisposeImagesInQueue(originalImages);Di2015NewLine            DisposeImagesInQueue(thumbnailImages);Di2015NewLine            DisposeImagesInQueue(filteredImages);                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5678587Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class BitmapFontDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class FontInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public FontInfo(WriteableBitmap image, Dictionary<char, Rect> metrics, int size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Image = image;Di2015NewLine            this.Metrics = metrics;Di2015NewLine            this.Size = size;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public WriteableBitmap Image { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Dictionary<char, Rect> Metrics { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Size { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, List<FontInfo>> fonts = new Dictionary<string, List<FontInfo>>();Di2015NewLine    public static void RegisterFont(string name,params int[] sizes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var size in sizes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string fontFile = name + " " + size + ".png";Di2015NewLine            string fontMetricsFile = name + " " + size + ".xml";Di2015NewLine            BitmapImage image = new BitmapImage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            image.SetSource(App.GetResourceStream(new Uri(fontFile, UriKind.Relative)).Stream);Di2015NewLine            var metrics = XDocument.Load(fontMetricsFile);Di2015NewLine            var dict = (from c in metrics.Root.Elements()Di2015NewLine                        let key = (char) ((int) c.Attribute("key"))Di2015NewLine                        let rect = new Rect((int) c.Element("x"), (int) c.Element("y"), (int) c.Element("width"), (int) c.Element("height"))Di2015NewLine                        select new {Char = key, Metrics = rect}).ToDictionary(x => x.Char, x => x.Metrics);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fontInfo = new FontInfo(new WriteableBitmap(image), dict, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(fonts.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine                fonts[name].Add(fontInfo);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                fonts.Add(name, new List<FontInfo> {fontInfo});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static FontInfo GetNearestFont(string fontName,int size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return fonts[fontName].OrderBy(x => Math.Abs(x.Size - size)).First();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Size MeasureString(string text,string fontName,int size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var font = GetNearestFont(fontName, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double scale = (double) size / font.Size;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var letters = text.Select(x => font.Metrics[x]).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Size(letters.Sum(x => x.Width * scale),letters.Max(x => x.Height * scale));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DrawString(this WriteableBitmap bmp,string text,int x,int y, string fontName,int size,Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var font = GetNearestFont(fontName, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var letters = text.Select(f => font.Metrics[f]).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double scale = (double)size / font.Size;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double destX = x;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var letter in letters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var destRect = new Rect(destX,y,letter.Width * scale,letter.Height * scale);Di2015NewLine            bmp.Blit(destRect, font.Image, letter, color, WriteableBitmapExtensions.BlendMode.Alpha);Di2015NewLine            destX += destRect.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

&H10190, &H101CF, "hAncient Symbols"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(120, &H101D0, &H101FF, "Phaistos Disc"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(121, &H10280, &H1029F, "Lycian"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(121, &H102A0, &H102DF, "Carian"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(121, &H10920, &H1093F, "Lydian"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(122, &H1F000, &H1F02F, "Mahjong Tiles"))Di2015NewLine        AllRanges.Add(New UnicodeRangeInfo(122, &H1F030, &H1F09F, "Domino Tiles"))Di2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLine    Sub New()Di2015NewLine        LoadRanges()Di2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLine    Public Function GetCharactersForUnicodeRanges(ByVal ranges As List(Of UnicodeRangeInfo), Optional ByVal returnSurrogatePairs As Boolean = False) As List(Of String)Di2015NewLine        ''//The Char structure cannot represent all Unicode characters so we need to return strings. See "Surrogate pairs" at the bottom of http://www.yoda.arachsys.com/csharp/unicode.htmlDi2015NewLine        Dim Ret As New List(Of String)Di2015NewLine        Dim S As StringDi2015NewLine        Dim C As CharDi2015NewLine        ''//Loop through all of the rangesDi2015NewLine        For Each R In rangesDi2015NewLine            ''//Loop from start to endDi2015NewLine            For I = R.StartRange To R.EndRangeDi2015NewLine                ''//Convert the integer to either a char or a surrogate pair stringDi2015NewLine                S = Char.ConvertFromUtf32(I)Di2015NewLine                ''//See if the character is a valid CharDi2015NewLine                If Char.TryParse(S, C) ThenDi2015NewLine                    ''//See if the Char is a letterDi2015NewLine                    If Char.IsLetter(C) Then Ret.Add(C)Di2015NewLine                ElseIf returnSurrogatePairs ThenDi2015NewLine                    ''//If asked to also return surrogate pairs then do soDi2015NewLine                    Ret.Add(S)Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Return RetDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine    Public Function GetUnicodeRanges(ByVal cultureName As String) As List(Of UnicodeRangeInfo)Di2015NewLine        ''//Get the culture info for the given localeDi2015NewLine        Dim CI As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureName)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''//Create and init our structure that will get passedDi2015NewLine        Dim FI As New LOCALESIGNATURE()Di2015NewLine        FI.Initialize()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''//Determine the size of our structureDi2015NewLine        Dim SI = Marshal.SizeOf(FI)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''//Call the unmanaged functionDi2015NewLine        Dim Result As Integer = GetLocaleInfoW(CI.LCID, LOCALE_FONTSIGNATURE, FI, SI)Di2015NewLine        If Result = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            ''//If we get a zero then there's an error. This should call GetLastError ideallyDi2015NewLine            Return NothingDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            ''//The lsUsb field represents a 128 bit value but we pass it into the unmanaged function as an array of 4 integers.Di2015NewLine            ''//The code below converts the array of integers to a giant binary string.Di2015NewLine            ''//There are of course better ways to do this that will save 5ms but I will leave that to youDi2015NewLine            Dim Usb = StrReverse(String.Format("{0}{1}{2}{3}",Di2015NewLine                                               Convert.ToString(FI.lsUsb(3), 2).PadLeft(32, "0"c),Di2015NewLine                                               Convert.ToString(FI.lsUsb(2), 2).PadLeft(32, "0"c),Di2015NewLine                                               Convert.ToString(FI.lsUsb(1), 2).PadLeft(32, "0"c),Di2015NewLine                                               Convert.ToString(FI.lsUsb(0), 2).PadLeft(32, "0"c)))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ''//This will be our return rangesDi2015NewLine            Dim LocaleRanges As New List(Of UnicodeRangeInfo)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim loopI As IntegerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ''//Loop through the bitsDi2015NewLine            ''//Technically the last couple of bits aren't supposed to be used but there is no value in UnicodeRangeInfo for them anyway so it does not matterDi2015NewLine            For I = 0 To (Usb.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                ''//This is to stop the compiler complaining about lambda expressionsDi2015NewLine                loopI = IDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ''//If the bit is setDi2015NewLine                If Usb(I) = "1"c ThenDi2015NewLine                    ''//Find all ranges in the master range list with that bit setDi2015NewLine                    LocaleRanges.AddRange(AllRanges.FindAll(Function(n) n.Bit = loopI))Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine            Return LocaleRangesDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Structure UnicodeRangeInfoDi2015NewLine        Public Property Name As StringDi2015NewLine        Public Property StartRange As IntegerDi2015NewLine        Public Property EndRange As IntegerDi2015NewLine        Public Property Bit As IntegerDi2015NewLine        Public Sub New(ByVal bit As Integer, ByVal startRange As Integer, ByVal endRange As Integer, ByVal name As String)Di2015NewLine            Me.Bit = bitDi2015NewLine            Me.StartRange = startRangeDi2015NewLine            Me.EndRange = endRangeDi2015NewLine            Me.Name = nameDi2015NewLine        End SubDi2015NewLine        Public Overrides Function ToString() As StringDi2015NewLine            Return String.Format("{0}-{1} : {2}", Convert.ToString(Me.StartRange, 16).PadLeft(8, "0"c), Convert.ToString(Me.EndRange, 16).PadLeft(8, "0"c), Me.Name)Di2015NewLine        End FunctionDi2015NewLine    End StructureDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

5679956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SelectConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(value is IEnumerable)) throw new Exception("Input is not enumerable");Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable input = ((IEnumerable)value);Di2015NewLine        var propertyName = parameter as string;Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo propInfo = null;Di2015NewLine        List<object> list = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (propInfo == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                propInfo = item.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine                if (propInfo == null) throw new Exception(String.Format("Property \\"{0}\\" not found on enumerable element type", propertyName));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            list.Add(propInfo.GetValue(item, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5684501Di2015UniqueSeparatorTrieNode root = rootOfTrie;Di2015NewLineTrieNode current = root;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (still typing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   switch (key pressed)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      case letter:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (current == null)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         bool found = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         foreach (successor trie edge)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            if (edge.Letter == letter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               current = sucessor edge.node;Di2015NewLine               found = true;Di2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (!found)Di2015NewLine            current = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      case whitespace:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (current != root && current != null && trie node is tag)Di2015NewLine            suggest node current as tag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         current = root;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      case backspace:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // You may want to handle this case by back-tracking in the trie.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         current = null;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      default:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         current = null;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5689099Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool ValidString(string myString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] validChars = new char[] { 'A', '!' };Di2015NewLine    if (!myString.StartsWith("A"))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    if (myString.Contains("!!"))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in myString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!validChars.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate List<string> SplitMyString(string myString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> resultList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    if (ValidString(myString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string resultString = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in myString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (c == 'A')Di2015NewLine                resultString += c;Di2015NewLine            if (c == '!')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                resultString += c;Di2015NewLine                resultList.Add(string.Copy(resultString));Di2015NewLine                resultString = "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return resultList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5691938Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SetNodeValues(Node node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (node.Name == String.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //If it has no name it is a leaf, which needs no valueDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Make sure all child-nodes have valuesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var childNode in node.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetNodeValues(childNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Sum them up and set that as the current node's valueDi2015NewLine        node.Value = node.ChildNodes.Sum(x => x.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5691971Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void printBitmap(rows, columns, numOfWhites, numOfblack /*, numOf... */) {Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(rows * 10, columns * 10);Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush bWhite = new SolidBrush(Color.White);Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush bBlack = new SolidBrush(Color.Black);Di2015NewLine    // ...SolidBrush bColor = new SolidBrush(Color.AnyColor);Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine    int countNumOfWhites = 0;Di2015NewLine    int countNumOfBlacks = 0;Di2015NewLine    // int countNumOf... = 0;Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine    for(int c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int r = 0; r < rows; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(countNumOfWhites < numOfWhites)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(bWhite, new Rectangle(r * 10, c * 10, (r + 1) * 10, (c + 1) * 10);Di2015NewLine                countNumOfWhites++; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(countNumOfBlacks < numOfBlacks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(bBlack, new Rectangle(r * 10, c * 10, (r + 1) * 10, (c + 1) * 10);Di2015NewLine                countNumOfBlacks++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //else if(countNumOf... < numOf...)Di2015NewLine            //{Di2015NewLine            //    g.FillRectangle(b..., new Rectangle(r * 10, c * 10, (r + 1) * 10, (c + 1) * 10);Di2015NewLine            //    countNumOf...++;Di2015NewLine            //}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bmp.Save("printedbitmap.jpg", System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5695779Di2015UniqueSeparatorj
5695779Di2015UniqueSeparatorj % array.Length
5695779Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void FindAndShift<T>(T[] array, T value, int shift) {Di2015NewLine    int index = Array.IndexOf(array, value);Di2015NewLine    int shiftsRemaining = shift;Di2015NewLine    for(int currentPosition = index; shiftsRemaining > 0; shiftsRemaining--) {Di2015NewLine        array[currentPosition % array.Length] = array[(currentPosition + 1) % array.Length];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    array[(index + shift) % array.Length] = value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

<mono/metadata/debug-helpers.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create an app domainDi2015NewLine// http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Application_DomainDi2015NewLineMonoDomain* domain = mono_jit_init("Domain");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// mandatory Cocoa call to show that Mono and ObjC work togetherDi2015NewLineNSBundle* mainBundle = [NSBundle mainBundle];Di2015NewLineNSString* dll = [mainBundle pathForResource:@"your-dll" ofType:@"dll"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// load the referenced assembly in our domainDi2015NewLineMonoAssembly* assembly = mono_domain_assembly_open(domain, [dll UTF8String]);Di2015NewLineMonoImage* image = mono_assembly_get_image(assembly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// find the class we want to wrap and create an uninitialized instanceDi2015NewLineMonoClass* classHandle = mono_class_from_name(image, "Name.Space", "YourClass");Di2015NewLineMonoObject* object = mono_object_new(domain, classHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this calls the default, argument-less ctorDi2015NewLine// for more complex constructors, you need to find the method handle and call itDi2015NewLine// (helpful hint: constructors are internally called ".ctor", so the descriptionDi2015NewLine// string will look like "Namespace.Class..ctor()")Di2015NewLinemono_runtime_object_init(object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get a method handle to whatever you likeDi2015NewLineconst char* descAsString = "Your.NameSpace.YourClass:YourMethod()";Di2015NewLineMonoMethodDesc* description = mono_method_desc_new(descAsString);Di2015NewLineMonoMethod* method = mono_method_desc_search_in_class(description, classHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// call itDi2015NewLinevoid* args[0];Di2015NewLinemono_runtime_invoke(method, object, args, NULL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// when you're done, shutdown the runtime by destroying the app domainDi2015NewLinemono_jit_cleanup(domain);Di2015NewLine

5698595Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic delegate void SocketEventHandler(Socket socket);Di2015NewLine    public class CustomSocket : SocketDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Timer timer;Di2015NewLine        private const int INTERVAL = 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CustomSocket(AddressFamily addressFamily, SocketType socketType, ProtocolType protocolType)Di2015NewLine            : base(addressFamily, socketType, protocolType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timer = new Timer { Interval = INTERVAL };Di2015NewLine            timer.Tick += TimerTick;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CustomSocket(SocketInformation socketInformation)Di2015NewLine            : base(socketInformation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timer = new Timer { Interval = INTERVAL };Di2015NewLine            timer.Tick += TimerTick;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly List<SocketEventHandler> onCloseHandlers = new List<SocketEventHandler>();Di2015NewLine        public event SocketEventHandler SocketClosedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            add { onCloseHandlers.Add(value); 5701778Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class NumberConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const string HEX = "0123456789abcdef";Di2015NewLine        public const string Bigger = "0123456789abcdefghihjklmnopqrstuvqyz";Di2015NewLine        private int _numericBase;Di2015NewLine        private string _base;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public NumberConverter(string numberBase)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _base = numberBase;Di2015NewLine            _numericBase = numberBase.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string ToString(int number)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var remainder = number % _numericBase;Di2015NewLine            var div = number / _numericBase;Di2015NewLine            string tmp = "";Di2015NewLine            while (div > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tmp = _base[remainder] + tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                remainder = div % _numericBase;Di2015NewLine                div = div / _numericBase;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            tmp = _base[remainder] + tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int ToNumber(string numberString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = numberString.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            int value = 0;Di2015NewLine            int power = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (index >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char currentChar = numberString[index];Di2015NewLine                var currentValue = _base.IndexOf(currentChar);Di2015NewLine                value += currentValue * (int)Math.Pow(_numericBase, power);Di2015NewLine                power++;Di2015NewLine                --index;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var converter = new NumberConverter(NumberConverter.Bigger);Di2015NewLine        int userId = 755757;Di2015NewLine        var numberString = converter.ToString(userId); // prints g759Di2015NewLine        var value = converter.ToNumber(numberString);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
