//1 centDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine                yourMoneyAccumulator += increment;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(yourMoneyAccumulator + " accumulated vs. " + increment * count + " expected");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct CurrencyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const double EPSILON = 0.00005;Di2015NewLine        public Currency(double value) { this.value = value; }Di2015NewLine        private double value;Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator +(Currency a, Currency b) { return new Currency(a.value + b.value); }Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator -(Currency a, Currency b) { return new Currency(a.value - b.value); }Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator *(Currency a, double factor) { return new Currency(a.value * factor); }Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator *(double factor, Currency a) { return new Currency(a.value * factor); }Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator /(Currency a, double factor) { return new Currency(a.value / factor); }Di2015NewLine        public static Currency operator /(double factor, Currency a) { return new Currency(a.value / factor); }Di2015NewLine        public static explicit operator double(Currency c) { return System.Math.Round(c.value, 4); }Di2015NewLine        public static implicit operator Currency(double d) { return new Currency(d); }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator <(Currency a, Currency b) { return (a.value - b.value) < -EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator >(Currency a, Currency b) { return (a.value - b.value) > +EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator <=(Currency a, Currency b) { return (a.value - b.value) <= +EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator >=(Currency a, Currency b) { return (a.value - b.value) >= -EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator !=(Currency a, Currency b) { return Math.Abs(a.value - b.value) <= EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator ==(Currency a, Currency b) { return Math.Abs(a.value - b.value) > EPSILON; }Di2015NewLine        public bool Equals(Currency other) { return this == other; }Di2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode() { return ((double)this).GetHashCode(); }Di2015NewLine        public override bool Equals(object other) { return other is Currency && this.Equals((Currency)other); }Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString() { return this.value.ToString("C4"); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5770641Di2015UniqueSeparator// Declare a function named "Factorial" that accepts a single integer parameter,Di2015NewLine// and returns an integer value.Di2015NewLineint Factorial(int number)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Declare a temporary variable of type integerDi2015NewLine    int temp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is a guard clause that returns from the function immediatelyDi2015NewLine    // if the value of the argument is less than or equal to 1.Di2015NewLine    // In that case, it simply returns a value of 1.Di2015NewLine    // (This is important to prevent the function from recursively calling itselfDi2015NewLine    // forever, producing an infinite loop!)Di2015NewLine    if(number <= 1) return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the value of the temp variable equal to the value of the argumentDi2015NewLine    // multiplied by a recursive call to the Factorial functionDi2015NewLine    temp = number * Factorial(number - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the value of the temporary variableDi2015NewLine   return temp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5772384Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected String _GetResourceName( String[] zSegments )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initialize the resource string to return.Di2015NewLine        String zResource = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize the variables for the dot- and find position.Di2015NewLine        int iDotPos, iFindPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop through the segments of the provided Uri.Di2015NewLine        for ( int i = 0; i < zSegments.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Find the first occurrence of the dot character.Di2015NewLine            iDotPos = zSegments[i].IndexOf( '.' );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if this segment is a folder segment.Di2015NewLine            if ( i < zSegments.Length - 1 )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // A dash in a folder segment will cause each following dot occurrence to be appended with an underscore.Di2015NewLine                if (( iFindPos = zSegments[i].IndexOf( '-' )) != -1 && iDotPos != -1 )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    zSegments[i] = zSegments[i].Substring( 0, iFindPos + 1 ) + zSegments[i].Substring( iFindPos + 1 ).Replace( ".", "._" );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // A dash is replaced with an underscore when no underscores are in the name or a dot occurrence is before it.Di2015NewLine                //if (( iFindPos = zSegments[i].IndexOf( '_' )) == -1 || ( iDotPos >= 0 && iDotPos < iFindPos ))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    zSegments[i] = zSegments[i].Replace( '-', '_' );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Each slash is replaced by a dot.Di2015NewLine            zResource += zSegments[i].Replace( '/', '.' );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the assembly name with the resource name.Di2015NewLine        return String.Concat( _zAssemblyName, zResource );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5776537Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine* Initialise the cipher and, possibly, the initialisation vector (IV).Di2015NewLine* If an IV isn't passed as part of the parameter, the IV will be all zeros.Di2015NewLine* An IV which is too short is handled in FIPS compliant fashion.Di2015NewLine*Di2015NewLine* @param forEncryption if true the cipher is initialised forDi2015NewLine*  encryption, if false for decryption.Di2015NewLine* @param param the key and other data required by the cipher.Di2015NewLine* @exception ArgumentException if the parameters argument isDi2015NewLine* inappropriate.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLinepublic void Init(Di2015NewLine    bool forEncryption,Di2015NewLine    ICipherParameters parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.encrypting = forEncryption;Di2015NewLine    if (parameters is ParametersWithIV)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParametersWithIV ivParam = (ParametersWithIV) parameters;Di2015NewLine        byte[] iv = ivParam.GetIV();Di2015NewLine        int diff = IV.Length - iv.Length;Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(iv, 0, IV, diff, iv.Length);Di2015NewLine        Array.Clear(IV, 0, diff);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parameters = ivParam.Parameters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Reset();Di2015NewLine    cipher.Init(true, parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5778521Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid DoProblem()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //string[] arrSample = new string[] { "!=", "=" };Di2015NewLine    string[] arrSample = new string[] { "!=", "<","+" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[][] arrPairs = (from op in arrSample select new string[]{op, GetReverse(op)}).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Array> myList = new List<Array>();Di2015NewLine    myList.AddRange(arrPairs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string x in Permute(0, myList))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<string> Permute(int a, List<Array> x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> retval = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    if (a == x.Count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        retval.Add("");Di2015NewLine        return retval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (Object y in x[a])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string x2 in Permute(a + 1, x))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retval.Add(y.ToString() + "," + x2.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return retval;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring GetReverse(string op)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (op) {Di2015NewLine        case "=":Di2015NewLine            return "!=";Di2015NewLine        case "!=":Di2015NewLine            return "=";Di2015NewLine        case "<":Di2015NewLine            return ">";Di2015NewLine        case "+":Di2015NewLine            return "-";    Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5779310Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly Regex DataContainerRegex =Di2015NewLine    new Regex(@"^(\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d\\.\\d\\d\\d) MC: (<DataContainer>.*?</DataContainer>)",Di2015NewLine              RegexOptions.Singleline | RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<Tuple<DateTime, XDocument>> Parse(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var matches = DataContainerRegex.Matches(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return from Match match in matchesDi2015NewLine           let date = DateTime.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value,Di2015NewLine                                     CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)Di2015NewLine           let doc = XDocument.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value)Di2015NewLine           select Tuple.Create(date, doc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

CustomProgressCellDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public sealed class DataGridViewProgressColumn : DataGridViewColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DataGridViewProgressColumn()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CellTemplate = new DataGridViewProgressCell();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CustomProgressCellDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sealed class DataGridViewProgressCell : DataGridViewTextBoxCellDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Public data accessorsDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the progress bar's Maximum property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public int MaximumDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _progressBar.Maximum; }Di2015NewLine            set { _progressBar.Maximum = value; startAnimation(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the progress bar's Minimum property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public int MinimumDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _progressBar.Minimum; }Di2015NewLine            set { _progressBar.Minimum = value; startAnimation(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the text to display on top of the progress bar.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string TextDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _text; }Di2015NewLine            set { _text = value; refresh(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the progress bar's drawing style.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public ProgressBarStyle ProgressBarStyleDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _progressBar.Style; }Di2015NewLine            set { _progressBar.Style = value; startAnimation(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Use these keywords in the Text property to their respective values in the text.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public abstract class MessageSpecialValueDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public const string Minimum = "<<Minimum>>";Di2015NewLine            public const string Maximum = "<<Maximum>>";Di2015NewLine            public const string CurrentValue = "<<CurrentValue>>";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Private member variablesDi2015NewLine        ProgressBar _progressBar;Di2015NewLine        Timer _animationStepTimer;Di2015NewLine        Timer _animationStopTimer;Di2015NewLine        string _text;Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DataGridViewProgressCell()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _progressBar = new ProgressBar()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Minimum = 0,Di2015NewLine                Maximum = 100,Di2015NewLine                Style = ProgressBarStyle.ContinuousDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _text = String.Format("{0} of {1}", MessageSpecialValue.CurrentValue, MessageSpecialValue.Maximum);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ValueType = typeof(int);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // repaint every 25 milliseconds while progress is activeDi2015NewLine            _animationStepTimer = new Timer { Interval = 25, Enabled = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // stop repainting 1 second after progress becomes inactiveDi2015NewLine            _animationStopTimer = new Timer { Interval = 1000, Enabled = false };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _animationStepTimer.Tick += (x, y) => { stopAnimation(); refresh(); };Di2015NewLine            _animationStopTimer.Tick += (x, y) => { _animationStepTimer.Stop(); _animationStopTimer.Stop(); };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override object GetValue (int rowIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _progressBar.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override bool SetValue (int rowIndex, object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value is int)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _progressBar.Value = (int) value;Di2015NewLine                refresh();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void Paint (Graphics g, Rectangle clipBounds, Rectangle cellBounds, int rowIndex, DataGridViewElementStates cellState, object value, object formattedValue, string errorText, DataGridViewCellStyle cellStyle, DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle advancedBorderStyle, DataGridViewPaintParts paintParts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReadOnly = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the cell borderDi2015NewLine            base.Paint(g, clipBounds, cellBounds,Di2015NewLine                       rowIndex, cellState, value, formattedValue, errorText,Di2015NewLine                       cellStyle, advancedBorderStyle, DataGridViewPaintParts.Border);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Draw the ProgressBar to an in-memory bitmapDi2015NewLine                Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(cellBounds.Width, cellBounds.Height);Di2015NewLine                Rectangle bmpBounds = new Rectangle(0, 0, cellBounds.Width, cellBounds.Height);Di2015NewLine                _progressBar.Size = cellBounds.Size;Di2015NewLine                _progressBar.DrawToBitmap(bmp, bmpBounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Draw the bitmap on the cellDi2015NewLine                g.DrawImage(bmp, cellBounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Replace special value placeholdersDi2015NewLine                var editedMessage = _text.Replace(MessageSpecialValue.CurrentValue, Value.ToString())Di2015NewLine                                         .Replace(MessageSpecialValue.Maximum, Maximum.ToString())Di2015NewLine                                         .Replace(MessageSpecialValue.Minimum, Minimum.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Write text over barDi2015NewLine                base.Paint(g, clipBounds, cellBounds,Di2015NewLine                           rowIndex, cellState, value, editedMessage, errorText,Di2015NewLine                           cellStyle, advancedBorderStyle, DataGridViewPaintParts.ContentForeground);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Row probably couldn't be accessedDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void refresh ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (DataGridView != null) DataGridView.InvalidateCell(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void startAnimation ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_progressBar.Style == ProgressBarStyle.Marquee ||Di2015NewLine                (_progressBar.Value > _progressBar.Minimum && _progressBar.Value < _progressBar.Maximum))Di2015NewLine                _animationStepTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void stopAnimation ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_progressBar.Style != ProgressBarStyle.Marquee &&Di2015NewLine                (_progressBar.Value == _progressBar.Minimum || _progressBar.Value == _progressBar.Maximum))Di2015NewLine                _animationStopTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5780451Di2015UniqueSeparatorAlls
5780451Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass AllDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public A A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public B B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public C C { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5780451Di2015UniqueSeparatorA[] myAs = new [] { new A(), new A(), new A()};Di2015NewLineB[] myBs = new B[] {};Di2015NewLineC[] myCs = new [] {new C(), new C()};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar combinations = (from a in myAs.Concat(new A[] { null })Di2015NewLine                    from b in myBs.Concat(new B[] { null })Di2015NewLine                    from c in myCs.Concat(new C[] { null })Di2015NewLine                    where (!(a == null && b == null && c == null))Di2015NewLine                    select new All() { A = a, B = b, C = c }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine

5781480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BspNodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<Vector3> Vertices { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // plane equation coefficientsDi2015NewLine    float A, B, C, D;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BspNode front;Di2015NewLine    BspNode back;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BspNode(Vector3 v1, Vector3 v2, Vector3 v3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vertices = new List<Vector3>();Di2015NewLine        Vertices.AddRange(new[] { v1, v2, v3 });Di2015NewLine        GeneratePlaneEquationCoefficients();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void GeneratePlaneEquationCoefficients()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // derive the plane equation coefficients A,B,C,D from the input vertex list.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool IsInFront(Vector3 point)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool pointIsInFront=true;Di2015NewLine        // substitute point.x/y/z into the plane equation and compare the result to DDi2015NewLine        // to determine if the point is in front of or behind the partition plane.Di2015NewLine        if (pointIsInFront && front!=null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // POINT is in front of this node's plane, so check it against the front list.Di2015NewLine            pointIsInFront = front.IsInFront(point);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!pointIsInFront && back != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // POINT is behind this plane, so check it against the back list.Di2015NewLine            pointIsInFront = back.IsInFront(point);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// either POINT is in front and there are no front children,Di2015NewLine        /// or POINT is in back and there are no back children. Di2015NewLine        /// Either way, recursion terminates here.Di2015NewLine        return pointIsInFront;            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// determines if the line segment defined by v1 and v2 intersects any geometry in the tree.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="v1">vertex that defines the start of the ray</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="v2">vertex that defines the end of the ray</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>true if the ray collides with the mesh</returns>Di2015NewLine    bool SplitsRay(Vector3 v1, Vector3 v2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var v1IsInFront = IsInFront(v1);Di2015NewLine        var v2IsInFront = IsInFront(v2);Di2015NewLine        var result = v1IsInFront!=v2IsInFront;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// both vertices are on the same side of the plane,Di2015NewLine            /// so this node doesn't split anything. Check it's children.Di2015NewLine            if (v1IsInFront && front != null)Di2015NewLine                result =  front.SplitsRay(v1, v2);Di2015NewLine            else if (!v1IsInFront && back != null)Di2015NewLine                result = back.SplitsRay(v1, v2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// this plane splits the ray, but the intersection point may not be within the face boundaries.Di2015NewLine            /// 1. calculate the intersection of the plane and the ray : intersectionDi2015NewLine            /// 2. create two new line segments: v1->intersection and intersection->v2Di2015NewLine            /// 3. Recursively check those two segments against the rest of the tree.Di2015NewLine            var intersection = new Vector3();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// insert code to magically calculate the intersection here.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var frontSegmentSplits = false;Di2015NewLine            var backSegmentSplits = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (front!=null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (v1IsInFront) frontSegmentSplits=front.SplitsRay(v1,intersection);Di2015NewLine                else if (v2IsInFront) frontSegmentSplits=front.SplitsRay(v2,intersection);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (back!=null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!v1IsInFront) backSegmentSplits=back.SplitsRay(v1,intersection);Di2015NewLine                else if (!v2IsInFront) backSegmentSplits=back.SplitsRay(v2,intersection);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = frontSegmentSplits || backSegmentSplits;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

5783903Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void BubbleSort<T>(this T[] arr) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < arr.Length-1; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (arr[j].CompareTo(arr[j + 1]) > 0)Di2015NewLine                swap(arr[j], arr[j + 1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5784972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct ImplicitNullable<T> where T: structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool HasValue { get { return this._value.HasValue; } }Di2015NewLine    public T Value { get { return this._value.Value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ImplicitNullable(T value) : this() { this._value = value; }Di2015NewLine    public ImplicitNullable(Nullable<T> value) : this() { this._value = value; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator ImplicitNullable<T>(T value) { return new ImplicitNullable<T>(value); }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator ImplicitNullable<T>(Nullable<T> value) { return new ImplicitNullable<T>(value); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator T(ImplicitNullable<T> value) { return value._value ?? default(T); }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Nullable<T>(ImplicitNullable<T> value) { return value._value; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Nullable<T> _value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Should define other Nullable<T> members, especially Di2015NewLine    // Equals and GetHashCode to avoid boxingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
